text: I've used this company for over 7 years. I've had a couple of times when i really was in a mess, i would call and they would always give 100% to get my problem settled. Ive been happy with the service i get from them we have 6 40 yard containers that they service and they always makes sure when they pick up they get anything that is dropped . They carry about 350 loads a year from here and no problems has happened that Zac has not taken care of. I have other company's come by and say they can do a better job but when i really look at there customers they are not happy. So  im staying with REPUBLIC and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Hello Curtis, Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  Republic Services has a long and proud history of reliably meeting the needs of our customers.  We are very proud of our dedicated team of professionals who take personal responsibility for serving our customers with care. We appreciate your business!

text: Robin McBurnett is the most professional, hardworking lady in business! She is a great asset for Repubkic Service !  I have never had any issues with delivery or anything , she definitely make sure that everything is on time ! I appreciate Republic Service !!!

text: I have removed service. Yet republic has billed me for 3 months of service that I have not used them. To clarify once my rep went from Robin to Charles Davis I got very poor service. At that time I decided to cancel service and go with a local company. Once I canceled service my rep has not fixed my billing errors. Corporate says they have emailed Charles to fix the errors but has not fixed them. At this point the time is greater than 2 work days trying to resolve this problem. My advice would be to switch to another local company that has better billing practices and prices as I have.

resp.text: Hi James, please accept our apologies for your frustrations and I am disappointed we have lost your business. I would like to look further into your concerns. Please send me an email to ccrm@republicservices.com. Please include your service address, contact information, and a copy of your original review. Thank you.

These workers are incredibly rude. Truck #2463 with two men inside decided to blare their horn multiple times early this morning in Anniston, up on Diana Hills, as they were picking up trash. Luckily I was awake, but other neighbors who work night shift or might have small children probably weren’t so lucky.
Talk about terrible customer service.

Not the first time they have not picked up on scheduled day.

text: This morning I woke up to a mess in my yard. The container was dumped over, two trash bags on the ground and the metal handle dislodged. My neighbor has it worse. Unbelievable.

text:
I was on hold for over 20 min before I could even talk to anyone, how can something like that happen?
They are rude and have absolutely no idea what they're talking about.

Ellos no mas quieren dinero....horrible horrible, $$$$....

name: Robert Amaro
text: I've used these folks twice now.  Two years ago, directly after purchasing a house that had sat dormant for 3+ years, the septic system decided to act up.  The Tice's came out late at night and found out that my tank was 100% overgrown with tree roots (reminded me of the scene in the Creep Show episode with the meteor).  They pumped down the tank immediately so that we could shower, and within a week they had come out and completely cleaned out the root system (chainsaw work INSIDE my tanks).  They did an amazing amount of work for a great price.  Yesterday, the old system started acting up again.  They came out first thing this morning so we could shower for work.  As we had suspected 2 years ago, the roots had gotten into the drain system as well. Absolutely amazing folks! Will always use them.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Amaro. See you soon.

name: James McElroy
text: Charged to much and did not finish pumping tank showed up nearly full tank complained about how much it cost him to empty truck ,left yard trashy with gloves and cardboard paper, said they would come back and finish pumping.      All they did was just pump water 1/3 of tank out in tank never came back would not recommend con artist. Tank was still 2/3 full call (Newell tank service they pumped out rest for a lot less than these would and was very professional)

resp.text: As I recall and I remember this night very well. We came out to your house and you had only dug up one side of your tank (1 lid) and you had another lid broken. We pumped all we could out bc we couldnt get to the other side that was not uncovered. We flushed out your field lines going back 125 ft bc they were stopped up and we were trying to save the lines for you bc you didnt have the $$ to upgrade your tank. He stayed out there with his HEAD down in your tank trying to help you out. Again, bc you didnt have the $ to upgrade he was going to go as far as bring you a concrete lid of ours to put on your tank in place of your broken lid. You talked to him the next day and he told you that he would come back out there and finish pumping the tank if you got it all uncovered and bring you another concrete lid with no charge. So that is why your tank did not get fully pumped out that night at 11pm.

name: wanda mccombs
text: I definitely would not recommended Jim Rice or his daughter they have no jefferson County license will take your money and leave with out finishing they charged 1248.00 to just cleaned out septic tank and then started telling me I need to upgrade said I had no field lines which was grap said he needed 4000.00 up front total price 6800.00 well came 2 times at night digging my yard in meantime messing my yard up with bobcat well 23 of January got a code violation from Leeds had no permit well he took the bobcat and left leaving my holes a mess . legal aid Merkei Wright has done nothing they did a invoice stated what they have done which was out right lie charged 2 times stated cleaned and pumped tank . there price is so jacked up too people do not use them

resp.text: Lets be clear Ms McCombs. Jim worked under your house for 6.5 hours to unstop the pipes under your house and he laid in YOUR raw sewage to unstop your pipes. We have an Alabama State license and County License. We sent you a check back to refund your money bc of all the problems you have caused us. There was nothing we could do at the time bc the WHOLE COUNTRY was shut down during COVID-19 pandemic. You were not patient with us and would not give the country time to get back to normal. BUT Jim was all great and wonderful when he came out to YOUR HOUSE in the middle of the night to unstop your house so you could go to the bathroom.. HE WAS ALL GREAT AND WONDERFUL THEN.

text: This company is very untruthful. Please make sure you have an understanding about the price before they come. text: This company  is a RIP off, charge me 1248.00 to clean septic tank  then starting  claiming  I need an upgrade  and that I had no field lines  well I have live here 24 years , gave me a price of over 6,000.00 said he needed 4,000.00 up front well game over 2 times at night  digging  up yard  on 23 of January  got  a code violation  he didn't  have a permit  that night he pulled out  left my yard  a mess both front and back  with major holes,  can't  get him back come to find out  no Jefferson county license  either should  not even started  it , biggest  problem  and crook

Thank you Brandy for the kind words. We strive for 100% customer satisfaction, and we are very happy when we achieve it.

name: Carrera Hallett
text: Worst customer service ever! And they do not pick up your garbage but will definitely charge you for it. Paid for twice weekly service and trash has only been picked up TWICE FOR THE ENTIRE MONTH.

name: Kyle Nichols
text: The services provided are not within their contract terms. They are regularly late by days and fail to complete the pick up. We are still waiting for them to come an complete our regular scheduled services from Last week! We have called everyday since the failed service and have done multiple online complaints. We were told every day that they would be out by the end of the day to complete service.  It has been 5 days and they have not shown up yet! I am beginning to wonder if there is a Lawyer out there who would take on a class action; as this is an on going problem in our area. Every customer who has had to deal with this on a regular basis should be given a prorated credit for their breach of contract.

name: Sharmene Smith
text:
Positive: The drivers are absolutely great! No complaints about them.

Negative: This company took over for Advanced Disposal in my neighborhood. First, everyone on my street received a trash can except for my family. We have to get up to put our garbage bags on the curb before the trash is picked up. We have to keep everything in our garage because animals tear into the trash if we keep it outside.

I've emailed through all channels with no solutions. Calling is even worse. It's been almost 3 months with no solution. We are getting charged for a 95 gallon cart that we have yet to receive.

At this point, we have no idea what to do.

name: Glenn Blakely
text: I have been displeased with this company ever since Saraland has gone with them. They do not pick up large piles of limbs and yard debris like our last company. They are late and have a habit of leaving the empty can in the middle of your driveway. It might be ok if you live in a neighborhood, but living along a main street, it is not wise to stop your car in the street.

name: Lori Rueschenberg
text: Previous waste removal company collected bins three weeks ago. Amwaste is my neighborhood’s new removal company.  I have called six times asking for a bin as the majority of my neighbors have all received their bins. One house even received 3 bins! I called on trash collection day to tell them to see if I could have one of those but was told the trash collectors do NOT deliver bins. Each time I have called I have been told they would get a bin to me. I was told that I was a customer in good standing as my bills were up to date. I am in the process of moving and have explained that I have less than a month to move. I still don’t have a bin for my trash. What kind of waste company does not provide paying customers with trash bins!!!  I have written only a few a Google reviews but this company takes the cake for being the worst ever!

name: Benjamin Taylor
text: I will file a formal complaint to whoever is the government authority. I have lived in my new rental house 2 months and they will not respond to phone or email. It is impossible to contact them. I need to be able to get trash service and pay for it.

name: David Black
text: It is hard to rate a service that is paid for, but not provided. We wait on the phone forever just to be told, “we’ll get someone right out there” yet they never show up. They don’t respond to emails. Extremely poor customer service to match their equally poor performance. Very disappointed our trash collection changed to this company. Please do better!!

name: Jennifer Gardner
text: No communication at all and horrible service!! We requested two trash cans when we built our house and were told that they did have enough cans to give us two. So whatever, but then a few weeks later our neighbors finished their house and moved in and were given two cans 🤔   Then we set up auto pay when we called to set up service and get our can, and they pick up our cans until all of the sudden they didn’t. Call and they tell us they haven’t received a payment since a date that was before we even moved in and even got our can or set up payment. We have not received anything in the mail to tell us there was an issue until we call to question things. When we start asking how a payment was made before we even moved in, what happened to the payment that was set up when we set up service, and how we have gone this long with them picking up our trash if a payment hasn’t been made they have no idea and no answers for us. We have never had a problem with any other waste company until now. Zero communication from them and then when you have an issue because of their lack of communication they don’t care and it is just your problem to figure out!

name: Karen Williams
text: This company provided very spotty service. I had 2 day garbage and then 1 day recycle. My trash pick up was not consistent and neither was the recycle. I've called and complained several times. The last time I called they tried to tell me I only had 1 day trash pickup which was a lie. I didn't always use the Tues service but was paying for it... she said that all I had was the Fri service so they took a day away because THEIR DRIVERS ARE INCOMPETENT. I will be pursuing another company

name: janice jordan
text: Terrible company, sometimes will pick up trash other times will pass it even though I keep my bill paid up. This company collect what they are TRASH!!!!

name: paul trunec
text: It took three weeks and three phone calls for the first pick up. Now, waiting two weeks for the current one. I  would have gladly paid the increase for Advanced  Disposal.

text: Every single week I have to call them to come pick up my recycling and household garbage. They are unreliable considering how much they charge every three months for weekly pick-up

text: Apparently this company took over Advanced Disposal’s bid in my area. We have a week of trash that has not been collected. We never received any updates from Advanced Disposal that Amwaste was taking over and we for sure have not heard from Amwaste! We only found out about Amwaste because our new neighbors next door informed us that supposedly they will now service our area. We have not received our new Amwaste trash cans and Advanced Disposal have not picked up there old cans. I am turned off already and I am extremely frustrated! I will be contacting the city and commissioners office first thing Monday morning!

text: Company does not respond to email contact on their website.  When I call the phone number on their LaGrange website, no one picks-up.  The driver does a good job on pick-up.

name: Kim McClafferty
text: Since AMwaste has become the provider for Jefferson County, AL waste removal the  company has not provided information related to the day of the week for our collection and and our trash container was removed and has no replace it with a new one (so far no container for 6 days).  The drivers have been great but the administrative group leaves a lot to be desired.

name: wethreesawyers Sawyer
text: Did not pick up garbage and trash. When I try to get ahold of them and fill out a message through internet like they asked. It then says oops something went wrong. I have tried four different times to submit a request for help, and each time it says oops something went wrong. I cannot get ahold of anybody to rectify the situation.

name: gilbert Pereida (G_peda)
text: They raised my bill from $60 a quarter to $93 without any warning verbal or written and was told " That's the new rate " I don't expect a discount but I do expect something in the mail the rate is going up by 50%.. there would be times they'd not pickup my garbage or recyclables ...

text: They promised to pick up side of the road garbage today, Friday, May 14th. Has not been picked up. Time is after 4 p.m. Other people have the same problem with them. We need to go back to the other company. Tney had a truck that came by every other Saturday.

name: Mark Stokes
text: I've seen a lot of negative reviews.  I signed a contract 9 months ago.  They missed my pick-up the first week, but from then on were great.  I sold my house 7 months into the contract after paying the third quarter bill and expected to have to pay the final quarter bill as well, even though I no longer lived there.  Not only did they cancel my contract, but they refunded me my third quarter payment that was already a month or so in.  There are ups and downs with any business, but I feel like they treated me more than fair, and I would recommend them if you need garbage service.

name: Tiana Rodgers
text: This company is TERRIBLE!!! They never pickup trash on time. They do not provide quality customer service to their customers. They make up lies EVERY TIME they miss a trash pickup. Michelle on the phone is a total mishap for the company. She lies about managers names and laughs when you call to complain over the phone. PLEASE STEER CLEAR OF THIS COMPANY !

name: James jeter
text:
We was with another company that kept going up on us. One day a young nice sales. Salesman came to our door and we let him in to hear his pitch. He was very polite and caring. Their price was actually better than what we was paying so we decided to make the change.
One day we  put the wrong can out and filled it with stuff that she was throwing away. Well later the next day, I noticed that day the team didn't pick it up since it wasn't a Amwaste can. So I called and talked to Lisa. They explained that since we pay for 1 can pick up twice weekly that the guys did not pick it up because it wasnt their can. I went to my bedroom for like 10 minutes and the can was empty when I came back in the front and looked out the window. Now that is service there my friends.

text: I read all of these bad reviews and then I had to learn myself just to give them the benefit of the doubt. They need improvement at best. I switched to have recycling and they have yet to pick up my recycling consistently. The woman in the office who answered my calls is really nice but they get one star from me and I’m switching back to my old company.

text: The company’s service is horrible. They only pickup once a week and never on time. This has been going on since COVID 19. I’m going back to Waste Management for $10 more per month.

text: This is the worst customer service I have ever dealt with. They care nothing about the customer and will not pick the trash up at all but they will bill you for no service, they used excuse after excuse for not picking up our garbage and then an out right lie saying the truck could not go over a culvert which we do not have. Do not do business with these people you will definitely regret it if you do.

name: Michael “Miggles” Migas
text: I pay for both debris and recycling pickup once per week. They come about every other week. The regular trash doesn't always get picked up either.

name: Autumn Demeranville
text: We have been with them since September. We experienced some of the things people are complaining about, but I understood they were getting used to a new route and customers. We received a friendly letter apologizing for the late recycling pick up. Explanation was the response was larger than they expected and had to make adjustments. Haven't had problems in weeks. They do handle Holiday pick up differently than the last company I used. I don't really know when they are going to pick up on a Holiday week, but other than that no real complaints.

name: A. A. Gapud
text: Doing a search for a phone number for this company, I happened to notice all these bad reviews, and felt compelled to say something positive. Perhaps I'm living in an alternate universe from everyone else, or maybe there's been some changes, but we've had nothing but positive experiences with this company. Our account is a residential weekly pickup of recyclables and garbage, and we switched to them last Fall 2019 because we were really taken by their salesman -- probably not the salesperson described in some of these reviews. Since then, we've had reliable pickup every single week, including holidays. Every time I had a billing question over the phone, I received great service (special shoutout to "Tori") and pleasant conversation. This current week was the only time they missed a pickup, and a call to Tori clarified that, not surprisingly, they are not picking up recyclables because of the current pandemic. Really sorry about the bad experience the others have received: We've had bad service from previous waste collection companies before, so I totally understand. But we've been happy with our service so far, and even highly recommend them.

name: John Cleverdon
text: Service was supposed to start on Tuesday, Sept. 6th.  Pick ups on Tuesdays and Fridays, recycling on Wednesdays.  Because of Labor day, I was told (by a neighbor) they were running a day behind, didn't find out until after they didn't pick up my trash that week.  Then the next week only picked up on Wednesday because I called after they didn't pick up on Tuesday.  Then they didn't pick up on Friday.  I called and left a message that it wasn't picked up.  When I called today (Monday) to make sure it was going to be picked up as scheduled, was told my contract was closed, and that I had called and left a message that I wanted to cancel my contract.  I didn't do that.  Was told they would re-open my account, and my trash would be picked up as scheduled.  I guess I'll see.  Maybe I should have left it cancelled and gone back to my old company.  They didn't do recycling, but at least they did what they said they would do - pick up my trash twice a week.

name: BRAD WALKER
text: Poor customer service good luck on getting your debris  or trash picked if I could give leass the 1 star I would

name: Alan Bowman
text: They are supposed to pick up on Tuesday... today is Thursday and they still haven’t picked up the trash. This happens at least once a month.

name: Jessica Whitney
text: They are awful! I’ve had them for a month they have changed my trash day 4x and then don’t pick it up so it sits in my yard for days. I’ve called over and over and told I would hear back from a manager and never did. I’ve been hung up on just becuase they don’t want to hear me out... don’t waste your time or money

text: The rudest freaking customer service I've EVER had to deal with! This is twice ive had to call for questions & they act like i disturbed their tea party! The next time i get this rudeness, i wil cancel & go back to my previous trash carrier! I'll be more than happy to pay a little more! At least my previous carrier wasn't RUDE when you had to call for questions 🤬

text: This company had a young man in my neighborhood going door-to-door yesterday. I clearly had a “No Soliciting” sign up, but this young man didn’t care. Even when I told him to please leave my property three times he was determine to get his sale pitch out to be heard. I have a question for Amwaste: What person in their right mind would sign up for service with your company, when the people you employ is disrespectful? I will never do business with this company. name: brett
text: This sketchy company has begun price gouging small, reliable garbage companies that have been operating in southern AL for 50 years. They go door to door (even when told not to or when people have no soliciting signs in their yard) and tell people they'll pick up twice a week, which if you look at their website for 2 seconds, they only pick up once a week everywhere else. Seems like an obvious ploy just to get people to switch. Don't buy into the shady sales tactics. I've heard of them pre-filling out their cancellation cards before, and even saying that they'll send out the cancellation cards for you causing people to literally be afraid this company is going to try to cancel their other garbage pickup service. I know on the surface an *initially* cheaper and *initially* more frequent garbage service that's coming into town may seem attractive, but remember to stop and think about what they stand to gain from you, and to research if they actually hold up what they promise in other areas. There's a reason that certain companies in this area have been around for literally 5 decades, and it was done by building a clientele through RELIABLE, FAIR PRICING slowly instead of lying to people about services / going door to door price gouging other companies until they raise the prices after those companies go out of business.

name: Scott Angus
text:
Opps...we made a big mistake changing to Am Waste. Our contract began August 2nd for pick up on Friday and Tuesday. They came Friday August 2nd, then it was Wednesday August 7th not Tuesday the 6th. Last time they picked up was late Saturday August 10th, not Friday as contracted and nothing this week. I called Thursday August 15th and was told that the gal on the phone would get a hold of the Supervisor and have someone come out. Now it is Saturday, I have an over-flowing can by the street and no sign of an Am Waste truck at all.

I want our money back so we can go back to a reliable service and I must warn you...DON'T DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY!!! THEY DO NOT HONOR THEIR CONTRACTS!!!

name: Matthew Booth
text: This company is an absolute joke. Called one day after signing on with their service to cancel because I read the reviews after I signed up on July 10th. Called the 11th to cancel. Called the 15th to confirm to find out that they had not cancelled. I wasn't getting off the phone until it was cancelled. Called back on the 30th to find out where my refund was and was told that they processed refunds at the beginning of the month. Just called today August 12th, one month after cancelling, still no refund. I was told that they didn't have a refund request on file. What kind of company has a separate refund request AFTER you cancel the service. This company needs to be put to the curb. Please don't sign up for this service! It will only bring you a massive headache.

name: Lisa Walker
text:
I’m only giving 1 star bc you have to in order to review. Yes the young man came to our door to solicit business. Due to the lower cost of the service we agreed to switch. This was on Thursday June 6. However my husband and I both had a change of heart and decided to stick to the service we’ve had for over a year with NO PROBLEMS. We have 3 business days to cancel per the contract. I canceled on Monday June 10. I was told they wouldn’t cash the check they were given and they’d send it back. Surprise!! They cashed it and after almost a month of the runaround from calling I was just told “they’ll issue the checks by the end of the month”. So here it is July 8th and I’m so grateful we actually didn’t switch bc their customer service is awful. I don’t have any problems with American Waste Solutions. Don’t be fooled by the “we’re cheaper” pitch. We decided the grass wasn’t greener on the other side and decided to stay with our current provider!  I want my $57 back and I will keep in them until I receive it. Again don’t be fooled just bc you wanna save $$.

****Follow up***. Here it is August 16 and I’ve yet to receive a call back from JUNE!!! I guess I’m let the BBB in on this transaction. It’s not even about the $57 even tho it’s NOT THEIRS!!!  I got a lady  today and she said they received the request in 8/5. Don’t make me get out my phone records and show you where I been calling since June. STAY CLEAR OF THIS DREADFUL  BUSINESS!!! You’ve been warned.

FINAL UPDATE:  Today 8/19/19 we FINALLY received our refund today!! It’s dated 10 days ago and no one has ever called back. I called again this morning for the office manager and I think it’s a safe bet  that she ( Mary Ann) ISNT gonna call me back but this nightmare is now OVER!! Good luck to anyone else in the same boat we were in.

Called back and told they do service my area, so I had to wait a week to get my SAME trash and back, but now minus the recycling can. So called back and asked for recycling bin as well as getting additional trash picked up, since I’ve been without trash service for 3 weeks due to them giving me the run around and taking my trash cans. name: Dillroy Schmoot
text: Called these clowns again by mistake. Wanted junk moved on a Saturday. I was "long distance from the sacred headquarters." Extra charge. Set up the appointment. No show. Cats couldn't read a map. Couldn't find the place was their story. Look at my next review to learn about cool cats who can read a map. College Hunks was nice enough to set up an appointment for Sunday. Surprised me. They called Sunday morning to tell me that they didn't have an empty truck. Couldn't show up, could I reschedule. I said no. Then it dawned on me. I called the wrong company. I called the idiots. That's on me. Two appointments, two no shows.  $599 was their quote because I was long distance. Check out my next review for how you don't ever want to deal with these morons.

name: Brittany Wood (bwooderp)
text:
I have never been SO frustrated with a company that I left an angry voicemail, but College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving has proved that I am capable of doing so.

I had a Junk Removal Service appointment with a scheduled window of 1-3pm today. Per the appointment confirmation email, I was expecting a phone call “20-30 minutes before [my] scheduled arrival time to let [me] know when [they’ll] be there”; so, when I hadn’t received a phone call, text, or email by 1pm, I dialed the phone number provided on the appointment confirmation email.

The woman I spoke with confirmed that my appointment was correctly scheduled with my given phone number and address, and she suggested that if I don’t hear from the drivers within 20-30 minutes, to call them back.

Time passed, and at 1:30pm I called again, this time dialing the local number provided on the website. Again, I was redirected to customer service, but this time the man put me on hold to contact the local Huntsville office for further inquiry. The man returned to my call and stated the Huntsville office did not answer, so he had left a voicemail. He suggested to wait out the duration of my appointment window, and that it’s rare to have a no-show.

3:00 PM, no-show. I am beyond frustrated. I call again. Connected with customer service again, this time with a man named Bernard. Again, he offered to call the local office, but I told him that had been done already and I was not receiving any feedback on what was going on. I asked him for the number of the local office so that I could call them myself, and apparently this is not normally allowed and requires supervisor approval ??? He went ahead and left a voicemail with the local office during my time on hold, and once back on the line, he let me know he had received supervisor approval to give me the name and number of the manager at the Huntsville/Madison office.

How interesting that within 4 MINUTES of me leaving my honest voicemail that I received a phone call from the manager, John Smith. He apologized, said his drivers were hours behind on appointments “probably due to flooding”, that “their phones all probably died” and he wasn’t able to contact them and his hands were tied. I let him know that plenty of the reviews I had since read of his company were incredibly negative, so this situation most likely wasn’t due to flooding.

HE HAD THE AUDACITY TO INTERRUPT ME. “Well we have plenty of positive reviews-“ I told him I wasn’t interested in further service and hung up.

I warned him that I would be sharing my negative experience across all social media platforms, and I’m looking into filing a claim with BBB as well.

name: Susan Duthie
text: I love College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving.  They have helped me with two large moves, and two more times in between the large moves, with moving furniture from one floor to another, putting together beds, and helping me move stuff to the back door for a local charity to pick up.  They have ALWAYS been very nice and patient, from the owner, John, the manager, Eliot, to all the different movers.  Our last move in October, 2017, Mike, Jeremy, and David were very careful with our furniture, and they spoke to us very politely, and they never lost their composure and positive attitude during our 8 hour move.  I will continue to recommend College Hunks to everyone, along with continuing to use them for all of our moving needs.  They never disappoint.  Thank you very much, College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving.

name: Katherine Wolfe
text: First time I used them,really nice guys, showed up on time and we're very professional.  Not a problem.  Second time, no show no call, who I talked to was  in Florida and could not get an answer from the store here to find out why they didn't show or call.  I got my money back and called Two Men and a truck.  I will never use College Hunks again.  I see a lot of negative reviews.  Unprofessional.

name: Diane Neustadter
text: College Hunks comes through. We needed to move a hot tub down a steep, narrow driveway. They sent four men, including the manager because he said he "wanted to be sure it was done right!" They balanced the tub on multiple furniture dolleys and slowly walked it down the drive. They were so efficient, the entire move (loading, travel, unloading) took only one-fourth the estimated time. We were thrilled to have the job done so quickly and carefully... and at a lower cost than expected.

name: Linda Knowles
text: Devin and Blake were a joy to work with.  These two young men didn't waste any time and worked with a happy attitude.  They made quick work of the move and were very open to every suggestion I had which made me feel really good.  They did it "my way" and I didn't stress at all.  I will definitely use them again should the need arise.  Great job Guys; Thanks!

name: Travis Newby
text:
I recommend you avoid College Hunks for a whole house move. We had quite a few issues...

1. They called the day before our multi-truck, 2 day move and told us they didn’t have us on the schedule to drop off, and would we mind our stuff being a day late. Having two children and nowhere to go, I did mind. (To be fair, their reaction and patience to what I had to say about this was far better than mine.)

2. When they movers did show up, they were nice and worked hard. But they were not professional movers. They won’t totally wrap your furniture. You will have dings and nicks. They won’t respect your hardwoods or your doors.

3. When they dropped the furniture off, they did it with only 2 people. We have heavy hardwood furniture and this created a VERY dangerous situation for their workers, me (who had to help), and my furniture. And in fact, a heavy dresser tipped off the ramp and almost crushed one of their workers. If I were him, I’d have stopped work and demanded more workers come.

Because of all these things, I think you’re better off with a more professional moving company for whole house moves.

name: Shanna Ndong
text: Unprofessional! I requested a quote on their website. Within 30 minutes someone from Hunks called me for additional information. I spent 30 minutes answering questions about my move, but because my move includes packing I was told that I needed an in-person inventory. I scheduled it for the next morning (a Saturday). Instead of someone showing up for the quote as promised, I received a call from someone with Hunks saying they needed an inventory over the phone. I explained that I was told someone would come by to do the quote. The woman replied, “that’s just the call center”. (What?!) I said I provided a lot of information yesterday and she again said “I just need an inventory of your stuff. We only come out for haul-away or when there’s more than 2000 sq ft”. I told her I’m moving to a 3500 sq ft house. She replied “I need to know what you have now at your current place”. I told her I live in a 3 bedroom apt and we have 2 full storage units. My move qualifies as greater than 2000 sq ft. She replied, “I just need an inventory”. I told her I’d go with someone else and hung up. Poor attitude and poor customer service. That’s not how you run a business. They should honor what their call center tells customers even if it’s a Saturday.

name: Richard Sparks
text: I am a disabled veteran who recently built on to my house. I needed assistance to move all the old furniture into the garage so new flooring could be installed. I could not have asked for two more professional caring people as Larry & Devin. They moved 2400 Sq Ft into the garage in 3 Hrs and 45 Minutes. The were even creative in figuring out how to remove my granddaughter's trampoline from the great room and get it through all the door ways to the outside. Professionalism - 5 Stars; Pride in Work - 5 Stars; Knowledge of work - 5 Stars; Overall - 5 Stars. Great experience and I have requested these guys back next week to move it all back after the carpet is installed. Thank you so much for providing a great service to our community.

name: William Neville
text:
My movers MIKE, Ryan,Nick and Lucas were awesome!  Very courteous.  Moved everything where we needed it moved.  They were very careful not to damage the walls or furniture.  Great job guys!!!
As a customer it ended up costing more than we anticipated but we had a lot of loose items and they had to add a guy.  I'd recommend getting 4 guys it will cost you less in the end.

name: Jeff Bosonetto
text: This rating should be a NEGATIVE 1,000,000 Stars.  These movers are completely incompetent and unprofessional.  They dropped my $2500 900lb safe off their truck after telling me that they could move it even though they had the wrong equipment and not enough guys.  Their resolution was a measly $500 to replace the safe that is now out of warranty due to 100% of their incompetence, plus they failed to put it where it was supposed to go. When I confronted the owner on his inadequate resolution, the owner laughed and said that something will always get broken on every move so I should have bought insurance.  Really?!  A 900lb safe is not a box of china. So what he is saying is that they are so pathetic at what they do that they WILL break something on every move, and its on you.  Use these immature, unprofessional children at your own risk.   There is no doubt that this pathetic company will be out of business shortly and their owner will be back to flipping burgers.  Now, I'm going to hire real movers to finish their job and we'll let the court system decide exactly how much they are going to pay me.

name: Carol McDaniel
text: I give the movers 5 stars. They were very professional and super hard working guys. They called and arrive right on time. However my issue was with team that arranged the move. I specifically asked for a truck with a lift gate and that was no what arrived. My move involved heavy data center computer hardware.  I also was quoted one price and charged another because Friday is considered a 'weekend'.

name: Davis McKelvey
text: I totally agree with everyone else who has given the College Hunks five stars.  So courteous, so punctual.  They showed up exactly as scheduled and completed the job perfectly.  I'm one happy customer and won't hesitate to use them again in the future.

name: Stephanie Cockrill MD
text: Great guys, super hard workers and very nice. Managed to fit an entire house inside a PODS. I was so worried it wasnt all going to fit, but they stacked everything so well! Excellent service. I will definitely use them again and recommend them to my friends and family.

name: TERI CARLOSLE
text:
College Hunks moved appliances (refrigerator, stove, dishwasher and microwave) and household goods to a charitable organization for me. These guys arrived early, moved items quickly and nothing in my home was nicked, damaged or bothered. The estimates I was given was accurate: I wasn’t charged extra for movers or the company trying to exceed my estimated cost. A manager came with the Hunks to my residence for overnight: very professional and astute. I’ve used 2 Men and a Truck, Allied Movers, Northern Van Lines: after using College Hunks in Huntsville, AL; I’ll never use any of the above named companies again. These young gentlemen are in college and want to work: today’s youth isn’t geared in this direction. I’m proud to have met these fine young gentlemen with a work ethic I admire. Thank you as a company: most of all I thank the crew who eagerly assisted me.

Sincerely

Teri Carlisle

name: Tinia Barnes
text: Tabb and Chris were polite and worked very hard. They did not waste time. We had a lot of heavy furniture and it was 90+ degrees. I would highly recommend them!

name: Becky Russell
text: I can't say enough about Mike & Job. They did a fantastic job for us today. They were very professional, on time, & very courteous in every aspect. Everything was handled with care. I was quoted 4 1/2 to 6 1/2 hours for what we needed and they fell right in the middle at 5 1/2 hours. I can't say how much I appreciate them and all they did today.

name: Loronda Davidson
text: We needed help moving a treadmill and found these guys. They arrived promptly and moved it with ease! I highly recommend them for any job you need help with. If I need help again, they will be my first choice! Thanks again!

name: NitaBillS Schmidt
text: Roberto and Nick showed up on time, called to say they would be there about 15 minutes before they arrived.  They were courteous, professional, and fast.  We could not have done it without them.  They both deserve a raise!   Thank you so much.

text: Very quick and professional moving! Took a lot of care with my items and two very nice men. Thank you so much for your help!

Mike and Marius showed up on time, worked quickly and efficiently, and moved the piano from Huntsville to Madison with no damage to the piano or either house. We were definitely pleased with this service and would use College Hunks again in the future!

name: Lora Cason
text: This is my experience with college hunks removal. After rescheduling twice you finally showed up to get your truck stuck in my driveway.  Your drivers used my landscaping rocks to attempt to move the truck and then threw them in my grass. After two hours a tow truck came to move the truck. Then your truck drove away without removing the furniture that needed removing because I had new furniture coming.  After calling the local Huntsville AL office they said they did not have time in their schedule to come back this week. This left me in a bind but ‘we haul junk’ came through later that day. I am so disappointed in the unprofessionalism i encounter with your company. I can assure you it was NOT STRESS FREE.

name: Isabel Evans
text: Very courteous and on time.  They were quick and packed the truck in a way that required the least amount of space possible.  Wonderful experience!

name: Drey Marlow
text: Absolutely 5 stars! Ameen and Jacob were quick and efficient! They beat the quote by 2 hours! They took extra care of my antique furniture and wrapped everything right. They took the time to ask me where I wanted the furniture in the new house. Would recommend 10/10 times!

name: D Igou
text: Chunk Junk was the best experience!  They were courteous, prompt, fair in their price, and the best part was the man handling our old 600 pound television from upstairs and out to their truck!  Couldn't have done it without them and we are so glad Chunk Junk exists!

name: Nathan Ford
text:
Mike and Mariuus did a fantastic job moving my family and me. Our house too longer than budgeted and actually took an extra trip. They were happy to do everything necessary to ensure we were totally happy.

We all had a great time working together. My two year old daughter has been asking where they went after they finished!

My only critique of Hunks was the estimation process. Felt a little rushed and I got conflicting info from the local and corporate systems.

name: Laura Priest
text: I could not have been any happier with my experience using College Hunks. I called for a quote at 2pm and they were at my house at 5:30pm that evening. Roberto and Jalen were incredibly respectful and they were so fast. They had our entire garage cleaned out in 1.5 hours. I would highly recommend this crew for the removal of junk or moving services. I also love that the workers are in college and if they receive a positive rating a portion of your total goes towards their tuition and books!!

name: russell lane
text: Mike and Devin were top notch, A+ guys! They were eager to get the job done, had a great attitude and work ethic, and moved A LOT of furniture and other household items FAST! Highly recommend these 2 for your next move.

name: Brianna Clark
text: I have used this service before and was pleased prior to this event. This time I used College Hunks the staff was very unprofessional. At times  one of the movers carried a pillow at a time to my moving pod. Both movers decided to place my solid oak table on top of boxes clearly marked fragile. Overall, there was a complete disregard for items marked fragile.  I expected more efficient work and attention to detail from the movers.

name: Tony Spinelli
text: Mike and Brian were extremely professional and got the job done quickly and safely. I would absolutely recommend these guys any time. I was in a bind and needed quick response, and they did not disappoint.

name: W W
text: Nothing but an excellent & easy experience from making the call to paying for my junk removal! The call & scheduling my estimate was a breeze. I love how you aren't obligated to pay unless you say, "Do the job." Eliot & Aaron came out & gave me an estimate which I felt was fair & they got to work. They were both very polite & accomodating to my needs and finished the job quickly. It was money well-spent as it saved me time & the headache of trying to figure out how I was going to remove the junk and where to take it. I highly recommend using College Hunks for your junk removal!!

name: Angela Howald
text: Erika is great to work with for scheduling and estimates.  Roberto and Nathan arrived early, were professional and efficient.  They moved my office quickly and without any damage.  I was very happy.

name: Karen Lee
text: Devin, Mike and David were AWESOME!! My move was difficult with numerous very heavy antiques and fragile pieces and collectibles. They carefully wrapped my furniture and got my things from house to house undamaged. They were real sports when I had them move furniture around after it was where I thought it was suppose to be! They are my team for future moves!

name: Kate Carson
text: Loved these guys! Quick, professional and helped easy to set up. Will definitely work with them again!

name: Rand Childs
text: The experience was excellent.  Very easy to schedule.  Truck arrived on time and the guys hauling away our old junk did an excellent job.  Glad Huntsville has this service!

name: Ed Preston
text: Fast, friendly, courteous and professional service. Devin and Shannon did an outstanding job. We're there in time, took care of my furniture (even a huge 1800s antique piano) and made sure everything was exactly where I wanted it before they left. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Alexandra Griffin
text: Somehow they can’t do any moving in Madison (????) and when their “home advisor” connected me to a very expensive alternative, I then proceeded to get spammed with multiple emails a day from the Home Advisor. When I unsubscribed, it takes up to TEN DAYS for changes to take affect?? You can subscribe me immediately but not unsubscribe me? Terrible knock off of We Chunk Junk.

name: Kathy Rupert
text: The two gentlemen that came to get our junk were friendly and professional. This is the second time we have used this service and are very happy. We will use it again.

name: Melani Trexler Mooneyham
text: We had a great moving experience and are very thankful for the wonderful job that Shannon, Steve and Jo did for us!  We are thankful for their hard work and professionalism!  Keep up the great work guys!

name: CECILLE SAINSBURY
text: Wow, what a positive experience.   So efficient and courteous, probably, best contractor experience leading up to this move.  Highly recommend College Hunks Hauling Junk.

name: Christy Sanders
text: Would definitely use again! I had a company storage unit that had to be cleaned out and the guys were on time and super nice

name: Barb Benjamin
text: These guys were great! Professional, polite, on time and very helpful. Give them a call!

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Great experience!  Timely, hard working, friendly and priced reasonably.  Couldn't have asked for more!  Would definitely use them again!!

name: Myra Schroeder
text: Our move was a nightmare as most moves are but College hunks was the only positive in this entire move.  I do not say this lightly as we had tire problems with our rental trucks we had breakdowns etc.  College hunks were very patient and accommodating as we had to change our times a couple times due to the breakdowns. They were always there for us, called us many times to make sure everything was OK not to pressure us mind you and we’re so polite and very caring of our household goods. Their district leader even showed up to see what he could do when he realized all of our household goods were put on the truck carelessly and many things broken. All this was due to the company Penske hired to move all our household goods once the breakdown occurred.  My husband and I will never hire any other company if we need anything done we’re moving is concerned. I highly recommend them to anyone at all because we worked with them in Florida and worked with a different group of them in Alabama when we moved and in both states the company and its people were the same. College hunks in Alabama was wonderful and we will hire them again when we finally find a home.

name: Arlene LaFrance
text: They were friendly,  curtious and completed the task quickly. I would definitely use this service again.

name: Sarah Matthews
text: These guys saved the day and helped make my move possible  and timely.  THANKS SO MUCH

name: Steve Reed
text: Drake and Marius were our movers.  Great experience!  They were very professional, courteous, and responsive.  I would move with College Hunks again.  Thanks!!

name: Jeff Tate
text: We had a great move today with Mike & Maruius with College Hunks in Huntsville.  They were extremely professional and treated our items like they were their own.  We will certainly use them again for future moves!

name: matthew clemons
text: Great experience. Maruius and Lucas were fast, professional, and very polite. I will always use College Hunks for moving and would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Susan Spencer
text: Fantastic experience. The movers were experienced and did a great job.

name: Jonathan Walker
text: Michael and Tamar were quick, efficient and arrived during my scheduled window. Price was close to expected and both of them were nice and friendly.

name: Scott Dennis
text: They did a great job and made sure we got items where they were supposed to go.

name: Jo Ellen Reid
text: Great experience, could not have asked for more polite and respectful folks.

name: Walt Schumacher
text: Roberto and Remson were friendly and efficient.  They got rid of a bunch of my trash, and also helped me move some furniture.  Great job!

name: Christy Tate
text: Mike & Maruius were professional and  courteous.  They took extra care with our belonging and went above and beyond to make sure they did not damage anything in our new home.  I would recommend Mike & Maruius and College Hunks in Huntsville for anyone looking to move in the area.

name: Tom Zebal
text: I asked for furniture movers... I got the junk haulers... In fact one of the guys told me "this is the first time I have moved furniture for a customer who was moving, I usually just do the junk removal".. They were HORRIBLE on my furniture and the walls & doors of my home as they moved the furniture... Claim filed.. NEVER again.

name: Terri Knight
text: Great communication. DeForrest and AJ  were Great! Thanks for the help.

name: Caron Sykes
text: Very easy and affordable. Great service!

name: P S
text: Great communication. Efficient and friendly. Highly recommend.

name: Kim Coulter
text: Michael and Christian were so helpful. And did a great job.

name: Tiffany Taylor
text: In three separate moving days, the team was a minimum of 45 minutes late for arrival, with one of those days being hours late. With initial discussions we were quoted and paid for a team of 6, but on moving day only 3 were there, 1 of whom spent most of his time in the truck rather than helping move. After a sight visit and quote, we were told we would be cutting it close with 1 truck but that she thought we could get it all. So to ensure we would be okay, my husband and I rented, loaded and moved a 12 foot covered trailer from uhaul in advance. But they still couldn't fit it all in the truck. We have had to haul another 15 foot uhaul truck plus will have to make several more loads in our SUV or pickup to get the rest. No one in the company has been apologetic in the least, and in fact have responded rudely, untruthfully, and completely inappropriately to our petition for their consideration of the inconveniences that their misquote has caused us... Oh, and by the way, their inability to properly drive a truck resulted in relatively significant damage to our property. At first, my husband and I were willing to overlook their errors and their incompetence, however their dishonesty is what has resulted in this post. In our opinion, this is not a company that values integrity.

name: D Benel
text: Great experience! Mike and Nick were polite, professional and accomplished my moving efficiently.

name: sharon davis
text: Very professional, curious and considerate of your home. Thanks

name: Vicky B
text: Maruius and Mike were extremely professional movers!  I would highly recommend them for big or small moves!

name: Jakeyah Williams
text: Aiden😎 was the best guy for the job 😊😊😊. Truly a young professional and all around friendly little guy!!!

name: Phaedra Dugan
text: Mike B and Joseph did a great job moving some large fragile antiques.  Very professional and on time.  Thanks!!

text: Friendly, efficient and well worth the price

name: Summer Smith
text: Great guys that do a great job! Thanks College Hunks Huntsville!

name: Kent White
text: Mike and Maruius were efficient, polite, and gentle with our furniture.  What a good experience!

name: Robert Kelley

name: Billy Jordan
text: Servpro was awesome. Came out quickly and got our crawl space dried within hours. Recommend them to anybody who needs something done right.

name: Heather McCormick
text:
Do not use this company whatever you do. I had my  rental house flood and it was the worst experience of my life using Serve Pro of Tuscaloosa.I had to call them 3-5 times to even go to the house to get the clean up  process started.Kept being told they was going out to start and when contractors went to give me estimates on repairs there would be no one at the house working on the clean up.They have lied to me several times about my property.Told me several different start and finish dates.They left drying fans in my house 7 days running after they had already cut the drywall and  insulation out. Drew one of the sales guys made up stories about the situation, told my tenant I had told him things when I hadn't even talked to the guy yet and told two different things ones to me and my tenant .I asked Drew why he did this and let him know I would be calling the office and  he proceeded to call my tenant a couple of times and send me a  6 page text over the situation which I found very unprofessional . When I called to complain about this Jacob the owners son took  up for the actions, was rude to me, did not listen to me and acted like I was bothering him.I was told my cabinets needed replaced when they did not. They pulled the vanity out of my master bathroom that did not need pulled out to begin with  without cutting the caulk and when they pulled the vanity it caused the mirror in the bathroom to fall on the sink shattering my mirror and busting my sink in the bathroom and tried to blame it on the heat in the room.I called  David the head of the construction department several times asking a start date and was told no repairs would be started  until they had 18 thousand upfront, Half the cost, and to ask my adjuster to call  his cooperate office and have Fed Ex deliver it to them.I asked my adjuster about it and he said that they did not that money upfront and was beyond shocked I had been told that.They still have their little lock box on my door a week after I told them I will not be using their services anymore, I have called four times to ask to have removed.I have called and asked  three times to speak to the owner of the franchise and got no response. The office staff is not friendly, they have horrible attitudes and make you feel  brushed off.  Brandy the girl in the office is very rude and  blows me off and acts like I'm a bother to her when I call to ask to speak to a manager or owner  . This is the most unprofessional company I have ever came into contact with in my life. And I strongly suggest people think  twice before using them for any reason. You will regret it if you  use this company, trust me on that.They thought since it was an insurance claim they would  take me for a run and rob me and  my insurance company blind and have caused me nothing  but a headache and  added stress from what happened to my home.

Chelsea
don't know how to reply to you  but this way. I too have a  job. Cant answer my phone if I'm busy.I have been trying to contact the owner since June 1st regarding all my issues when they first began.Have called several times .Today is June 20 and first attempt to be reached out to by the owner. You need  new office staff and employees that don't lie to customers and be extremely rude to them. I want my sink and my mirror replaced that was broken courtesy of your employees negligence. Thank you.

resp.text: Good morning Heather, I am deeply sorry you have not had a good experience talking with our staff. I have notified the owner, when we received your yelp review also. It looks like he tried to call about 9:00 am this morning. Please feel free to reach out at any time or email us at servpro8822@servprooftuscaloosa.com. The office has been directed to patch you through to him direct, if he is in during our office hours 8am-5:00 pm. I will follow up with him this afternoon to try and reach you again. I apologize for your less than ideal customer experience during this event in your home. The owner and I would be happy to work with you to figure out where communication errors started and how we can correct them in the future.  - Chelsea

name: Tammy
text:
They were all very sweet and helpful when they came out to our house for a house fire. But then everything got very confusing. We didn't know what was going to happen or when. Then they came in and packed all of our things up, first our clothes and no one told us to keep out any clothes. So we had no clothes blankets or pillows by the time they finished. There was 2 rooms that just had to be cleaned but they threw out our beds and furniture and took out all the carpet. We put notes on two closets and put don't enter.. I found the notes in the floor when we returned. They packed up everything and took it with them but nothing was cleaned it was just in the box they had packed it in.
They told us they we're going to clean the duck work, it was not cleaned, the ceiling fans were not cleaned nor were the blinds. We have had to just  about replace everything  we own plus we had use or own  money to eat at the hotel for   for over 2 months. Being nice is great but we had to many people telling us different things..it took a month after we got to come home before they started bring things back. It made difficult to cook. We had to buy new pots just fry an egg.
When they finally brought things back they were very confused about everything because the young guy and 3 woman that packed us up were fired. They didn't seem to know what was ours and what wasn't.  There are quite a few things missing.  Some of the items are antique and can't be replaced.  The thing is these items problem  went to someone else  and they just saw it was old and not there's. Maybe I need to go check the thrift store.  I didn't think this was going to be easy but this has been a nightmare. I have items that have tags on them, but they didn't take them or clean them. My blinds still have soot on them and it is not easy to clean. They we're supposed to clean and check or duct work , not even touched. And we saw the check our insurance sent them and that was way too much for this mess. This is the first time in 15 years we have made a claim on our house or auto  and now State Farm will not cover our house anymore. So we are going to have to sale our house and move because this put us in the red.

resp.text:
Tammy, I am so sorry for your bad experience with our crews. This is the first we have heard of any issue with your loss. We are trying to look into it internally, but would love for you to call the office at 553-8377 and let us know more so that we can get this issue resolved and make sure everything met to your satisfaction. - Chelsea

Tammy, Thank you for editing your review so that we may have a little insight on why you are unhappy with SERVPRO. I would like to also thank you for your kind words on our crews being "sweet and helpful." I can address that clothing and other textiles were cleaned by another company and not by SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. We would like you to reach out to our General Manager and Owner at 205-553-8377 when you are comfortable and allow us to address and mend your concerns that we do have control over. Any issues between the claim and your insurance provider will have to be handled through their customer service, as our company does not have direct correlation between your insurance coverage. Again, we are sorry for the headache that was truly in control of our Franchise and the General Manager/Owner would, again, invite you to call and see how we can clear up confusion and give us the opportunity to fix what we are able to.

name: Christina Graham
text:
Please consider this review a PSA! Do NOT use this place. Perhaps if you are a corporate client, they will do well on your job. If you are individual customer, they likely will perform extremely poorly.

I was lied to on a couple of different occasions with my job, in particular about them contacting my insurance and the times that they did so. They typically arrived late (45 min to 1 hour) or on one occasion, they were so late that I was told to not even bother waiting. This was actually after being told by the person managing my job (supposedly managing it) that he thought they were finished up at my place. NOPE! Even after officially signing off that they were done, I brought in another mitigation company...and they are currently finishing the job that ServPro was hired to do.

There are major breaks in communication internally, as well as externally. I wouldn't recommend this company to my worst enemy. Please don't use them and keep them in business any longer.

resp.text: Christina, this is deeply disturbing news to read. We did not know you had any concerns during your experience with SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. Our office deeply apologizes for your additional distress in your experience with our crews. Residential claims are very important to us as well and we strive to do our best whether we are in a residential home or commercial business. We are very sorry you feel you did not receive our best. Our owners and management are actively investigating your claim file and you will hear from us directly with more questions and information soon. We want to make sure you are taken care of properly and wish that we had known throughout the job process that you were unhappy with the crew in your home.

name: David Solomon
text:
For this review, I feel I must first present a little information up front.
For the last several months I have been having issues with the plumbing in my house.  My house was built in 2007 with PVC pipe throughout.  Let’s just first say that after purchasing the home I later believed the plumbing was not installed to code, and first experienced several water leaks of which I fixed myself.

Several months ago I hired a plumber to come in and resolve a hot water (lack of) issue.  The Hot water tank had made an awful screeching noise similar to what I have been hearing in my modern GE Refrigerator with a water filter. At the time the plumber removed a check valve on the water Heater which resolved my Hot water problem and the screeching noise.  No further investigation was conducted on why the Hot water heater started having issues and I believe that repair cost me around $100.00.
So in the last couple of months I have still have that screeching with my Refrigerator and the pipes had been banging whenever we flushed one of the toilets.  Upon doing some research to try and resolve the banging pipe issues I had come across an article on a thermal expansion tank upstream from the Hot Water Heater on the Cold water line.  I located mine under the house just as the main cold water line comes in the house. The tank has a valve in it and is supposed to give a cushion for the water when it expands.  I went to check the expansion tank and when I put on an air tester, water came out, which is an indication of a faulty tank.  I purchased a new one and left the air pressure at the manufacture default and installed it.  Now my pipes started banging worse and the tank started making a sucking sound. I further researched the issue and found an article that too much water pressure can wreak havoc on your water system so I went to Lowe’s and picked up a cheap home water pressure gauge. I tested my system and found that my home was averaging around 130PSI. Based on this information resources indicated that a faulty Pressure Relief Valve (PRV) just up from the home water meter could be the culprit. I located mine by digging about a foot up from the local water meter and left it uncovered.
It was finally time for me to call a plumber as I am not one, and only completed the previous steps out of necessity.  I am a retired Enlisted Veteran and have not had a real job for six years and have been struggling to pay my bills.

The day before Christmas I called B & C Plumbing Inc. and left message on their phone system that I would be needing their services when they could work me in.  Tuesday after Christmas I received a courteous phone call from the B& C customer service and scheduled a Master Plumber to arrive at my home between 14:00 – 16:00. Shortly after that Drew the Master Plumber called me from his cell phone and said he was on his way over because he had a cancellation and would come and resolve the issue.

This is where the negative experience starts.  Drew arrived at my front door knowing the information that I had already shared previously and I shared that information with him again on what my issue was going on under the house.  His first statement to me before looking at anything was that it was going to cost me $300.00. No indication of a discount for anything or because I was a Military Vet.  Now first off, I expected that he would be crawling under my home and fix some of the issues with the bagging pipes (Non-Code meeting).  He had no time to give me a run down on what the problem was nor what it the cost layout was to fix my issues.

He proceeded to place a water pressure gauge on the outside faucet and recorded that the PSI was 145. He then went to the Pressure Relief Valve (PRV) and replaced it spending less than two hours of actual time far less work as much of the time was him on the Cell phone.

resp.text: Mr. Solomon, in response to your review I would like to apologize for your unsatisfactory experience with our company.  I would also like to state that we did not install the plumbing originally in your home in 2007.  We thank you for your comment about our courteous service manager calling and setting up your appointment.  We always offer an estimate for the cost of the repairs before any work is conducted, which you approved and paid for the work performed.   We do offer military, senior citizen, and all local law enforcement discounts, if we are informed ahead of time we can most certainly add that discount to your invoice.

text: Let me start by saying that this is the first time IN MY LIFE that I’ve written a bad review about a business, so the fact I feel strongly enough about this matter to do so should say enough in and of itself. Mr./Mrs. Brooks, I kindly ask that you or someone in charge reach out to me in a timely manner.  As a courtesy and to give you a chance to address the issue, I will refrain from posting detailed information of surrounding incidents and the lack of professionalism and timeliness your company has exhibited thus far.  If I do not hear from anyone in a timely manner I will have to share my story in order to help future people hopefully never have to deal with the same issue(s).

Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Kerry Brooks

name: Kelsea Garrett
text:
I’m at a loss for words as I write this review, but am hopeful that what happened to our family doesn't happen to someone else.

My grandmother had a horrible fall that was devastating to her life. My  Dad trying to do everything he could in that moment to comfort family took a beautiful handmade silk pastel Turkish area rug to have cleaned.

With loss of family in that moment you don't think clearly especially when it's unexpected.  The rug was dropped off; there was no proof of receipt provided at the time.

The rug is no where to be found and because there was no receipt provided no proof we were told nothing can be done.

Being the price of the rug and sentimental value alone we hired an attorney to contact the store owner, and unfortunately were told there was no proof.

I hope nobody else ever has to have the same experience. Please be sure if dropping off a high ticket item regardless of the emotional state you may be in to get an exchange of a paper trail, the employee’s name, and would even add to take pictures. Beyond disappointed in how the owners have handeled this situation with no effort at all to make any attempt for a resolution.

resp.text: SERVPRO® of Montgomery is sorry to hear of the traumatic experience you and your family have suffered. Knowing what you have been through, it saddens us to know that you feel we have mishandled one of your family heirlooms. As stated in your review, there is no paperwork showing it was delivered to us for cleaning. We value our customers and enforce stringent protocols and procedures for any items entrusted to us. This helps to avoid any confusion or loss. I would like to personally investigate this matter but will need additional information to do so. Please contact our office at 334-284-1612 and ask for Kerry Brooks.

name: Linda Finney
text: The adjuster was very prompt coming to see damage. I was pleased and look forward to hearing start date.

name: Judy Van Luchene
text:
Several days after the house was empty, we stopped to see the progress...nothing.  For two weeks, we checked every
day, no workmen.  We were assured we would be back in by Christmas.  We went through three Project Managers, and
three different set of drywall and painters.  The first painting crew stood on my washer and dryer to paint the
ceiling in the laundry leaving dents and scratches.  We had stored the liquor from our bar in tubs in the garage,
as Servpro would not remove alcohol from the home.  Apparently the painters had found it and consumed a great deal
before they were removed from the job by Darin Ingle.  They also got paint all over our floors so Servpro brought
in commercial scrubbers which removed the finish on all of our floors.

To shorten this story, I will cut to the return home.  We finally returned to our home in early March with work still
going on, Painting and damaged floors. The first night home the water under the sink of my brand new cabinets
flooded the kitchen.  They had to send in dryers and a plumber who said it was not hooked up correctly and
reworked all of the kitchen dishwasher and sink plumbing. They sent in a professional flooring company  to assess
the floors. Their solution required us to move back into a hotel for at least a week so they could clean, reseal
the tile and recolor the grout.

The only thing that saved this project was Darin Ingle who arrived on the project in February.  Darin was sent in from another state to resolve the
problems at the Montgomery location that included our home.  Darin took the reins, brought in new crews and came
every day to ensure the work got back on track and that it was done correctly.  Darin's arrival was months into
the project and while we have never sued anyone, we were on the verge of doing just that to get another company
to come in so we could go home.  I am not sure if Servpro's executives realize that Darin not only saved our project,
saved them from a lawsuit but did an amazing job saving their reputation.  I would only call them again if Darin Ingle handled the job.
Because of Darin, I am giving Servpro a 2 star rating and Darin a 5.

An update to my review.  I was contacted by Mr. Bowen, an owner.  Mr. Bowen was determined to do something to do something for All we had been through.  He offered to send in a crew or something.  While his offer was appreciated, we had already fixed many of the issues and did not feel we could ensure another work crew I agreed to think it over and get back with him.  The one thing, as I explained to him, that distressed me everytime I went into the laundry was the dents and scratches on the tops of the washer and dryer which he eagerly agreed to replace.  With much of manufacturing shut down for long periods, appliances are in short supply.  However, Mr. Bowen and Darin Ingle were able to replace order And have new ones installed.  My frustration is no longer renewed when I walk into my laundry room.  My thanks to Mr. Bowen for reaching out and making this a better experience, and to Darin Ingle for making it happen.  It is good to know they cared to make things better.

resp.text:
Hi Judy, I am one of the owners and I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Bruce Bowen

name: Maurice Arnold
text: Jenny Grant did an outstanding job with her prescriptive process for eliminating a smoke smell in the house I am selling. Most businesses focus on their bottom line; however, she focused on service and doing what's best for the customer. There is no wonder she is a sales leader. Good things come to those who lead with a beautiful heart of service.  Jenny G.is the BEST!!!

name: Dennis Shadden
