name: Jill Upchurch
text:
The guys were very professional, careful, and fast!!! Very pleasant experience!  They even were able to come the same day and help
me re-arrange and remove some furniture  I will use them again.

name: Josh Norton
text:
This company is absolute garbage. Their employees are inexperienced, clumsy, and unable to handle simple problems. If you have an issue, you will be directed to some call center down in Tampa, FL, who are absolutely incompetent as well. The Call Center can, and will only, call the local franchise owner to express your complaint. This franchise owner, never reaches out to his customers, despite the fact that my wife and I both got his cell phone number and left numerous messages.

Now on to what actually happened.

My wife's parents recently moved and we needed to move her piano out of their house, so we hired College Hunks to move the piano. We expressly told them that it was to move a piano and that was the only thing that needed to be moved.

The scheduled day approaches. They said they would be there at 4:30. When 5:30 eventually rolled around, so did they. ((Strike One))

They then moved the piano out of the house and down the first step for a total of about 15 feet. Then for some inexplicable reason, could not move it any further. Not only that, but it was ONLY THEN that they realized that they had no way of getting the piano up on their truck. So they came to a job knowing that they were going to move a piano without the proper equipment and without enough people.

Then comes the worst part of all. Instead of moving the Piano back inside where they originally moved it from. THEY LEFT IT OUTSIDE!

They Left the damn piano and said that they would be back tomorrow!

Wait, it gets better.....

The next day rolls around and again they say they will be there between 3:30 and 4:30. Well, 5:30 comes and goes and still no word from these stooges. That is when my wife and I started calling that call center and reaching out to the Franchise Owner and even the guy driving the truck.

They said they were running late and would be there at 6:30. We then asked them if they had a different truck or additional equipment. They told us what they were bringing and IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT THEY HAD THE DAY BEFORE.

7:00 PM comes along and still no word. We call that Call Center again, and this time they tell us that they had to reschedule and that they would be there the following day, which would have left this piano OUTSIDE for TWO Days!

I finally had enough of these inept morons and called up someone who also owned a moving service. He was able to get out to the house the following morning and move the thing in less than an hour.

To sum up:

This company absolutely sucks. Incompetent Employees + Incompetent Ownership and Service. They left my wife's piano OUTSIDE for TWO Days before we finally had enough of their nonsense and hired another company.

I will never use College Hunks again, nor will anyone that I know.

After I am done with this review, I will actually be looking into filing a claim against these morons for the scratches that they also put on the piano during their re-enactment of a Monty Python Sketch.

name: Jared Leader
text: This was our first time using a moving service and I was blown away with the amazing quality of service. Mark, Andrew, and Ja'mon were fantastic. They were professional, knowledgeable, and worked really well together as a team. Not only did they get the job done in a timely fashion; they also went out of their way to make sure our stuff was well taken care of. I will definitely be using this moving service again and requesting these three!

name: James Luker
text: Very friendly and efficient. Got the job done quickly. Price was great. 5 stars.

name: Courtney Evans
text: Very unprofessional. The college 'hunks' were very rude. As well as almost running us and our vehicle over. Very very childish. Please dont waste your time with this company.

name: Deborah Jones
text: I'm really satisfied with their service. They arrived an hour earlier than expected which was great! I was given a call beforehand to see if this was ok. They made short work of hauling out my junk and the team leader Eddie was very courteous and pleasant. The price was $250 lower than another junk hauling company in the area. I will be using them again for my moving needs later this month.

name: Clay Brooks
text: BRIAN, LUKE, AND MARK WERE SO GREAT THE ENTIRE TIME. IT RAINED ON THEM ALL MORNING BUT THEY WERE SO KIND AND HELPFUL DURING THE WHOLE MOVE AND NEVER HAD A BAD ATTITUDE. I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH HOW WELL THEY DID, AND THEY WERE ALSO SUPER FAST AND EFFICIENT. I WILL DEFINITELY USE YOUR COMPANY AGAIN, AND RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS BECAUSE OF HOW WELL THESE THREE GUYS DID. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

name: connie hartley
text: DEVON AND BRYAN WERE AWESOME AND WORKED HARD. GREAT PERSONALITIES, VERY PLEASANT TO BE AROUND, PATIENT WITH ME AS I FIGURED THINGS OUT! THEY SWITCHED FURNITURE IN 2 BEDROOMS ON OPPOSITE SIDES OF HOUSE WHICH INCLUDED A VERY LARGE FAMILY HEIRLOOM, KING BED, CRIB TAKEN APART & PUT BACK TOGETHER. SEVERAL CHEST, DRESSERS, CHAIRS AND MORE. name: Sarah Smith-Mohan
text: I had to call College Hunks Hauling Junk last minute after another Junk removal service had canceled on me because their trucks were full. The man who set up my appointment for College Hunks was very nice and made me feel like a priority. The Hunks came first thing on a Sunday morning. They called me 30 minutes ahead of their arrival, like they said they would.  The two Hunks were friendly and polite.  They worked fast and efficiently.  All my Junk was gone in a flash at a reasonable price.  I am very happy with their service.  I’ll only use College Hunks in the future.

text:
College Hunks these guys were fantastic. They were on time and very neat and courteous. They took care of all my personal and fragile belongings with no problems. They delivered my Furnishings from Alabama to Albuquerque New Mexico and everything arrived in perfect condition. I would recommend this company to anybody who cherishes there personal moving items. name: Chiquita Rudolph
text: The same-day service provided was great! Walter and Tyler called ahead to let me know they were on their way. They were polite, worked quickly, and cleaned excess debris when they were done. I’ll happily recommend this company to family and friends.

name: Jennifer
text: After setting up an appointment for an estimate, my husband, who works overnights, stayed up later into the morning in order to meet someone. There was NO phone call, NO show, and NO remorse when I called to get an explanation. When I asked for a manager to see what happened and why there was no phone call or any response, the call center rep, Bernard, assured me that a manager would call me back and they would go ahead and reschedule my appointment and someone would call me 30 minutes prior to arrival. Of course, I told him I wasn't rescheduling ANYTHING until I spoke with a manager and still have had no response. Even after another call where I left a message, there is still no response. It seems apparent that making the move "stress free" is the last thing on their minds and managers also don't seem concerned with making or losing new clients either.

name: Libby Loveless
text: Great experience getting rid of some large items that no other junk removal services would take. Kind and hardworking guys! Recommend.

name: Natalie Herrera
text: I the Hunks to move me from Birmingham to Alabaster. Wipe it went a little over quote they kept me informed and I felt like part of the team. Unfortunately the truck was too big to fit down the drive way at my new house. Thank you Garrett and Jerome they were awesome!!!

name: Lillian Whitley
text: They are the best. I had some heavy furniture and they also put my bed together. I had three guys helping they are friendly, courteous and very helpful in placing my things where I needed them to be. I recommend them highly and will use them again pretty soon for junk removal when ready.

I received a call the night before to confirm the appointment, and again 30 minutes before they got there! They were probably in and out in about 30 minutes!! They were super helpful and very careful not to scrape the walls. Ive used several different moving companies before, but Mario and Tyler were by the friendliest and quickest! I will never use anyone else EXCEPT College Hunks Hauling Junk!

name: Markedia Stafford
text:
If you are looking for reliable, these are NOT your guys.

Movers called two hours before my scheduled appointment to cancel. Next available appointment they offered was 3 days later.

Scheduled appointment was on a Friday, which is much too busy to schedule any other movers. This left me totally screwed.

The caller didn't even bother to apologize or offer any sympathy. Very poor customer service.

name: Micah Colley
text: I called this past Saturday around noon to inquire about the availability of a crew to haul off an appliance for me. Von and Tyler were in my driveway 2 hours later. They were professional and courteous and provided hassle free, AFFORDABLE service. I highly recommend these guys!

name: Kyle McDermott
text:
The movers were courteous, kind, and very quick. They get 5 Stars.

4 Stars given because I was unaware that there was a after hours charge of $100, otherwise I would have booked my service much earlier in the day. The movers were able to drop it down a bit, but still shouldn't be told the exact second they show up about it.

Would use them again. Just not after 5pm.

name: Douglas Burnette
text: We were really in a bind. On short notice we needed to empty our Mother's house with 60+ years of accumulated stuff. The Hunks showed up on time and were exceedingly polite and efficient. It took two days to finish the job but Tanner, DJ, Quincy, Marcus and Devaun did a fantastic job and we are very grateful to them. The more accurately you can estimate the amount of stuff you need hauled the better off you will be. I recommend their service without reservation.

name: Courtney Harper
text: The guys were polite and did a great job maneuvering large pieces downstairs and through the house and to the next location. They took care not to scratch the ceiling or floors. Our experience was great. Thank you!

name: Megan Eerqbist
text: These guys came out to remove a pile of trash from my curb that the city would not pick up. Connor and Jacob were very nice and thoughtful as the swept the street with a broom and dust pan to ensure nothing was left behind. The whole ordeal could not have taken more than a half hour iIwas back to work before my lunch was over.

name: Pamela Crowe
text: I want to say Thank You to Tyler and Vaughn (hope I got their names right).  They came and took all my big junk away, including a mattress set,  entertainment center, and even an old water heater. They worked quickly and efficiently, cleaning up everything as they went.  They were polite and professional. Now I finally feel like I can get the rest of the work done.  Thanks, guys!

name: laura silva
text: Had an awesome experience with this company. Guys showed up on time and took great care of my stuff. Would definitely recommend and will use their service again!

name: Mary Elizabeth Neal
text: Great crew of hard-working young men. Our quoted 12 hour move was finished in 9, and all our belongings were handled with care. Great overall experience and I will recommend in the future!

name: Zack D
text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!! I saw the bad reviews but they were the most affordable so I thought I would give them a chance and now I’m paying for it. You get what you pay for, right?! They were schedule for 9:30 but they say they have a one hour window, that’s fine but they didn’t show up for over an hour and a half! They called and said it would be 30 more minutes because they got lost and it ended up being right at an hour!!!!!! They showed up, looked at what they had to move, told me to sign something without explaining it to me and I asked what it was and they mumbled, “you can read it.” One guy made the comment to the other they didn’t have enough pads, right in front of us then had to ask us for supplies. Luckily we are in the middle of moving so we had tape but what would they have done if we didn’t?! I moved what I could to speed up the process because they were sooooo slow, seemed like it was the first time they had moved something. FINALLY, they got everything moved and my husband told them to follow him so they wouldn’t get lost again. Where my husband took a right, they kept going straight and didn’t show up for another 15 minutes when the other way is only 2-3 minutes longer. I called them to ask if they got lost again and wait for it...... THEY STOPPED ON MY WATCH TO GO EAT LUNCH! You don’t show up late when my entire day consist of this then stop and get food on my watch, guess what I haven’t eaten either! I called and spoke with the manager and he took $50 off the travel fee but I’m still not satisfied. When you call and speak with the company they tell you how professional the movers are, how they will come in and assess the home and go over a price with you beforehand, blah blah blah! None of that happened! They have completely ruined our day, our first day in our new home and I hope no one else has to deal with this!

text: Benji, Lee, and Quincy communicated with me throughout the day to let me know when they'd be arriving. They showed up right on time and worked efficiently and effectively.  They were friendly and I would recommend them to anyone who needs something hauled away.

name: Mark DiGiorgio
text:
I booked an appointment for 8-9am. They Arrived at 10am.
The two young men that came out to move my stuff worked hard. I asked for the truck fee be be waived (89.00)and I would pay the labor fee. The manager could not waive this fee so I asked for the owner. She did not want to compensate me properly for my time away from work. It was clearly the fault of the empolyee's the night before. So DO NOT except the OWNER to compensate you if something goes wrong.

name: Dane Evans
text: Made an appointment with them and tried to call back however because I didn't have my zip code on me, it still wouldn't allow me to speak with a representative and transferred me to homeadvisor. Absolute Garbage service on the phones

name: Jason Deeney
text:
** be wary of all the fake reviews on here, obviously this is just the owners and workers making fake emails to put reviews up and hide the real reviews.  Very strange that almost all of their five-star reviews are from people who only have one review written.  Usually if someone is going to take the time to write a review and it’s the only one they’ve ever done it’s because of a poor job, not an awesome job***

It is funny that this company has a motto of “ how can we make your day stressfree?”  All they do is cause more stress.  The actual movers are inexperienced and I had to coach them through the process of getting the couch through a doorway.  The first day of the move they kept me waiting six hours before they got there and the second day they were four hours late.  Management is of no help, neither are the owners.  The guys who did the move were friendly, but sometimes that is not enough.  I hired this company to pack the apartment and move it downstairs in the same building, I ended up having to pack and move almost everything by myself.  The only thing the movers ended up moving where the pieces that were too large for me to do by myself.  In fact, I had to hire a random Uber driver to help move things so I can get out an hour early to make my flight which the owner and manager is new prior to the move, but did not care.  They talk a good game, but cannot walk the walk.  Be wary of all these excellent reviews, if you look on Yelp you will see true reviews.  I would recommend any other company in the world over this one.  The only thing the movers brought was one dolly and one screwdriver.  My next stop is to file a complaint with the better business bureau.

name: D bros
text: College Hunks helped me move out of my place and they did a great job! Sean and the rest of the crew were very friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend them for your next move.

name: Hailey Green
text: Great workers, loved having Henrik and Pierce move my family! Thank you College Hunks! Truly a stress free experience!!!

name: Brynn Welch
text: Fast, friendly, arrived exactly when they said, and did a better job than my hired movers at protecting my walls and carpet. Tyler and Derek were great! Definitely would use again.

name: Brenna Terry
text: Courteous and communicated well! Sean and Taylor were awesome and prompt in both arriving and moving my old furniture.

name: Judy Ping
text:
Had a ton of garbage out on roadside from a rental house. Got a
Notice from the city on the door the next day that we would be fined if it was not removed. Called ALL my friends, who was either to busy or couldn't help for other reasons. Put in on social media ( FB) to pay someone come to remove it. Got a call, they said they would do it for $60, I said Great! Come on. While waiting for them got a text saying they made a mistake it will be $80. I was wary, but I said ok. 30 min later a text said $100. I was tired of playing their game. Called College Hunks Hauling Junk, they were there same day, reasonable price and super professional! I highly recommend them.

name: Abby Dupuy Rogers
text: Tyler and Vaughan helped us clear junk from our storage area and they did a great job. They worked as quickly as they could given the large amount of junk that needed to be moved. They were polite and respectiful of me and all the other employees they encountered.

name: Robert Gillespie
text: Great customer service and fast pick up! Tyler and Von were prompt, professional, and got the job done fast.  Will definitely call on them again.

name: Chrissy Spero
text: Derek and Josh did a great job helping me move across town! They loaded/unloaded quickly while taking care to not scratch the walls/doors/furniture itself! Thank you!

name: Glenn Ross
text: The crew was quick and efficient. They made the task of moving a parent’s belongings into assisted living easier.

name: Julie Gafnea
text: I booked them to help me move into my first home over the weekend. I booked an itemized job consisting of all the large items that I could not move myself. My appointment window began with no call from them, which I found odd. I called the main number to get an ETA, but no one ever called me, despite an assurance by the rep. that they would. Another hour or so went by. I called again and was again assured that I would get a call with an ETA. Then, my appointment time passed completely. I called a third time and was told that there was nothing they could do and that the manager was not responding to any calls. So, I call the worker that called the night before to confirm my appointment. The worker picked up and proceeded to have an extremely unprofessional conversation with me about how he and his fellow worker were overbooked, and how they only have three trucks, and that he was still working at another job, and he was way on the other side of the county, and then refused to give me any sort of ETA (basically, he'll be here when he gets here). All the while, the other worker is repeatedly screaming "tell her to call customer service" in a rude tone in the background! Over an hour goes by after that, it was dark and cold by then, so I finally called and told them don't bother, if they even intended to ever come. So, after everything, I was left without several pieces of my furniture, including my bed, dresser, and chest of drawers. Now, I am just waiting until next weekend, until I can get another company to come out and help. Needless to say, I would not recommend this company to anyone.

name: D'Ann Carrillo
text: Very polite young men and arrived earlier then expected. Would definitely recommend and use in the future.

name: terra crane
text: Very professional. Came on time, super nice, and were really quick workers. We definitely use or recommend.

name: Seth Green
text: Great job, they came 5 minuets early and moved a piano and sofa like it was nothing. Recommend this moving company!!

name: Sarita Colvin
text: Awesome service! They truly made sure on phone and in person that I had a great day! Will keep them in mind for the future!! Thanks Guys!

name: Anita Frederick
text: GREAT EXPERIENCE, TYLER AND VAUGHN WERE QUICK TO COME AND GIVE ME AN ESTIMATE AND TAKE CARE OF THE WORK WE NEEDED AT MY OFFICE. I WOULD DEFINITELY USE THEM AGAIN.

name: Marcella Calloway
text: Pierce and Garrett did an excellent job moving me to Huntsville! Nothing was damaged and it was $300 cheaper than I thought it would be!! I’m going to recommend them to everyone who needs movers!!!

name: Vela Hardrick (Vela)
text:
I got my 30 min call to confirm that the movers were on their way then one of the movers ask me what all I need to have moved. I tell him a 5pc. dinette set, love seat, couch, and 2 end tables he says okay see you soon. Then he calls back and says hey it's going to cost you $600/ $700 dollars is that okay... I cancelled the pick up because online I wasn't quoted nothing close to that. 😲✌️🏃🏽‍♂️🏃🏽‍♂️🏃🏽‍♂️

Update: I ended up calling a junk removal company in Trussville and they actually came out and gave me a price that wasn't anywhere close to the price college hunks gave me. I truly feel like the guys didn't want to come across town and do any work when it only took one guy to remove the items from my house in less than 30mins. The employees not only lost this company some money no matter how small but they also are giving them a bad name. I wouldn't recommend college hunks to anyone that asks me.

name: Michael Finley
text: Great customer service & excellent communicators. Completed work in a timely manner, worth the cost!

name: Ashley Edmonds
text: My experience was phenomenal!  Morris and Roderick were amazing, professional, and very respectful of time!

name: Kelli Dahl
text: The guys did a great job and were really nice and polite! We will definitely use them again!

name: amber Rich
text: College hunks we’re fast and friendly I’ll definitely be going back ! I recommend them to all my family

name: Charlotte Lewter
text: Arrived promptly. Just 2 guys and hauled off a driveway full of stuff in an hour.  Very professional.

name: Amanda Huett
text: Drivers were 6 hours late initially. It was like pulling teeth to get anyone on the phone, I couldn't reach anyone from the franchise until they were already 2 hours late. This made us literally sick with stress. They complained about the hill we lived on, the stairs they had to use, and that they had been working over 14 hours at that point. There were huge periods of time that neither mover was actually moving anything. It took 8 hours to load the truck, even though during the walk through we were quoted 7 for the entire move. It took them 3 hours to make a 2 hour drive. The unloading only took 3 hours. The guys that unloaded the truck actually did their job. They were very surprised it took the other movers so long to load the truck. The co owner of the company Sean refused to talk to us. Conner, the other co owner tried to convince us that they lost money moving us. We were quoted $752, it ended up costing $1380. It was awful on my two children, we didn't even get to leave our old house until 12:15, and the movers didn't finish unpacking until 6. We could have done it faster ourselves, and we aren't

name: Jennifer Tamburello
text:
I do not like to be negative. However; when you speak and plan with the appointment people and their words of action do not happen, confidence is lost.  The appointment was for 2:00pm thru 4:00pm. The driver would call my cell 1/2 hour before arriving. This did not happen.  I called the appointment phone number at 3:15pm just to check if all still ok. She stated she could see my confirmation number for the 2-4 pick up of my donation. She stated she would call driver and have him call me. It did not happen. I called appt. # again at 4:10pm and asked was pickup to happen. He stated he would call driver no one called me that evening so I set it up for pick up on Saturday 10-12. They arrived and then 1/8 of the truck was only room for my one tv. 1/8 is $99.00.
To Load a small tv and a plastic plant would move cost $139. We did not pay the increase.
The truck was full from the day before pick ups. In defense of the two men today they were not the driver or worker from day before.
Company has too many open variables on size of load, cost to haul and failure to pick up first day or even to call us. No way to confirm you getting space paid for.  Sorry!

name: Ben Norton
text: College Hunks Hauling Junk was able to get a crew out to my daughter's apartment on one day's notice to disassemble and remove furniture that the charity we contacted left behind. Being 2,000 miles away and trying to arrange things while she was taking finals and getting ready to graduate, I was panicked. I am so glad we found these guys--they saved us.

name: Depree Williams
text: If I could rate a zero I would. My elderly mother was taken advantage of. She was charged $700 to remove items. A full truck was quoted at $499 and when it arrived it was not empty. I have filed a complaint and it has been over a week and no one has responded. I would not recommend this company to anyone.

name: Lisa Williams
text: Very unprofessional company. My original appointment was scheduled for Sunday, 9/3/2017, between 4:00 - 6:00pm. By about 5:50pm, I had not heard from anyone and decided to call to be sure my items would still be picked up. The customer service representative said she would have someone call me with an estimated time of arrival. Ben called me about 5 minutes later and stated that he and 2 other guys were on an "underestimated move job" but they should arrive to pick up my items at about 7:30pm. No one came that night or even called to tell me that I would need to reschedule! I called the next day which was Labor Day and was told by the customer service representative "Jessica" that the Birmingham office was closed due to the holiday and would reopen on Tuesday, 9/5/2017. I told her that I wanted to speak to a supervisor and she said that she would have one call me on Tuesday and she asked if I would like to reschedule my appointment for Tuesday, which I did, for a pickup between 4:30 - 6:30pm. I did not receive a call from any supervisor the next day. I called back a few hours before my pickup and talked to the customer service representative "Jessica" again. I told her I had been waiting for a call from a supervisor and she actually asked me why I needed a supervisor when my appointment had been rescheduled! I could not believe she actually asked me that question! She transferred me to supervisor/Greg Williams who didn't have much to say and lacked skills as a supervisor and appeared to have no experience in customer service. It was very bad business that no one showed up for a scheduled appointment and didn't even have the courtesy to call.

text: If I could, I would rate this company 0 stars. They have a wacky billing cycle for the area, every 3 months. Their customer service is terrible. Unlike the cities that contract the bill through the residents water bill, the people in the county have to deal with these unprofessional clowns directly. If I had a choice, I would choose a different company to do my business.

text: The worst customer service I have ever encountered. Guy came to my house, went IN my carport to retrieve my can for non payment of a bill I haven't received. When stopped and questioned about what he was doing he was rude and argumentative. I had to make him show me the back of his truck, because I honestly didn't believe he was with the garbage company at 1st. He couldn't show me any paperwork other than a chart that said I had 2 cans, I only have and always have only one. Then threatened to call the police when I tried several times to get a number for me to call. Once I was able to get a number and talk to a Tammy ? name: Pat Hamilton McMurrey
text:
This service is used by a nursing home that is near us, about a block away. They come out almost every day to empty the dumpsters. The truck comes anywhere from 4:00AM - 6:00AM!!!! If it wakes us and the other neighbors up from some distance, I can just imagine what it's like for the poor residents who live there! I called their Lincoln, AL office and explained the situation and asked if they would adjust their schedule and come there a couple of hours later since it is in a residential area. I spoke with a lady who assured me she would pass the information along to the scheduling department and took my telephone number. The call was made about a month or so ago. There was never any return call and the truck came out ONE time at 7:25AM and promptly returned to their "middle-of-the-night" schedule. I am not in the best of health myself after having had cancer and then chemotherapy and I am now still taking a pill form of chemo. I desperately need my rest to finish my recovery and sleep does not come easy anyway. It seems that about the time I go to sleep for a few minutes, BAM, SLAM here comes the garbage truck!
I know these people can make this adjustment and pick up at businesses that are not in residential areas if they choose to do so!!! They just do NOT choose to be a good "neighbor". They obviously have no thought or compassion for human beings since they refused to work with the people of this community. I have not tried speaking to the city but I'm not sure if they would have any influence nor whether a petition would help.

name: Laura Brown
text: I paid for service on March 16th where I too was told 7-14 days. It is now April 5th and I too still do not have a trash can. How hard is it to drop a trash can at the end of my drive way? I have called 5 times this week. And now they say they will send it to dispatch and it will be tomorrow. This should not be an issue at all! What are we suppose to do with our trash pay to take it to the dump ourselves when we pay for a service?

text: Canceled over a year ago when moving houses and they never canceled. text: Probably the worst company to be with. I’d rather pay triple for another company to come pick my trash up on time.

name: Em
text: We've been renovating a house, and their roll off large dumpster prices are incredibly deceptive. They will tell you that it's a 300 fee for the dumpster itself,  plus a 100 drop off fee, a 5 a day rental, and 3 tons included with a 42/ton fee for overage. Then you will get hit with multiple massive spikes after a final pull off, even if you pay up front for the dumpster and delivery. It's another 300 just to remove the dumpster which is not disclosed (yes, even if you paid up front for the dumpster). I have no idea how they calculate their final price, and no one can really explain it. Everyone comes up with a different number breakdown and different explanation. Expect to spend 700 to 1000 a month for the dumpster, no matter what Advanced tells you.

How exactly does this company want folks to sign up? Online and by phone apparently ain't it...

name: Rebecca VonBartheld
text: The garbage man always knocks over my garbage and when I call he never comes back but charges me 60.00 The only service in my area.

name: Eric Crossley
text: Need a new trash can so I put in a service request a month and a half ago. Still no can. And they said they could come replace it any day so I have to leave it at the end of my driveway which is a quarter mile long. They also keep telling me I havent got a new one yet because of covid.

name: Glenn Payne
text: An employee, NOEL, was so nice and efficient.  She was the nicest person I have dealt with in a long time.  If everyone was like Noel everything would be alot easier and more pleasant.  Advanced disposal is lucky to have Noel as an employee.

name: Roderick Pearson
text: I have been waiting in a trash can for a month and a half now. Constantly getting the same run around about a delivery date. Why have a 3rd party handling apart of the business when it isn't doing it's job. Very unprofessional.

name: Kimberly Jacboson
text:
My son ordered a trash can from this company over 2 weeks ago and pre-paid for the services as of this date he still has NOT received the trash can nor has anyone informed him that it would take this long!! When he called about getting his money back he was informed that it would take 6-8 weeks to issue him a refund.... SERIOUSLY 6-8 WEEKS???
This company needs to be investigated!!

name: Mark Mitchell
text: Have been trying for nearly 2 years to get them to send my bill to the correct address, their automated billing system always says I have a zero balance no matter what, I call every quarter to pay and half the time that doesn't work. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! Thier accounting is terrible. I was told a week ago that I was paid up through next quarter, then the following week received a collections notice.

name: Stephen Littlefield
text:
CUSTOMER CARE CENTER
We take care of our customers. They are our highest priority.

This is straight from their website. They couldn't even pretend to help me. They straight out refused. It's all about them getting that check.

name: Tonye Tennille
text: Still waiting a month for a trash can they picked up and dropped in there trash machine.

name: Cindy Woelfel
text: Was told 2 weeks ago i would get can before my next pickup it's saturday my pickup is Monday. But you can bet I will be charge for service. BTW they picked up my can after I paid someone forgot to post my payment.

name: Rachel
text:
We had garbage pickup roughly 6 months ago but I had to cancel due to both me and my fiancé working out of town. Now that I’m reordering, the quarterly payment went from $30 to $50? I don’t understand the price increase.
Update: I was told I would receive my garbage can in 1-2 business days. That was last Friday.. it’s Thursday of the following week and no garbage can.

name: Landon Bragg
text:
DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY.
I have had issues since day one with this company and its total lack of accountability. A missed trash pickup habit was reported and turned into a driver breaking my can, refusing to pickup trash, management ignoring repeated requests for service and outright lying from customer service personnel. Do yourself a favor and find literally anyone else.

name: jude_hey 20
text: Worse experience ever. For over a whole month I called to let y'all know that my trash wasn't being picked up. I paid for it. Finally I called today just to be told that my account was closed and that they stopped servicing in Dekalb county since june 30th and I paid for service for the next 3 months. The whole time I was calling to tell y'all about the trash and no one let me know that y'all weren't servicing Dekalb anymore. Y'all basically took my money then didn't service me anymore without notice.....

name: Amanda Bowlin
text: This company is horrible. If there were another service provider in my area, I would go with them in a heartbeat. I have paid this bill for over a year now, to only have to call every couple of weeks and all but beg them to come get my garbage. EVERY COUPLE WEEKS FOR OVER A YEAR!!! Apparently, the issue is that my can is on the left side of the road. It doesn't matter that there is a drop off on the other side, the drivers just don't want to have to turn around to get my garbage. I hear the same excuse week after week. They always promise to have my garbage picked up by a certain time the next day, it never happens, then gets picked up on the normal pick up day for 2-3 weeks before skipped again. The office doesn't care to fix the problem, just pay the bill and be quiet. They also refused to come get their can when I told them I'm done with their service, and will pay to recycle/dump my own garbage.

name: Jim Noland
text: Good C\customer service.  Very reasonable prices.  Keeps customers updated about holiday pick-up or other delays.  Overall very, very good disposal service!!!!

name: Karla Shackleford
text: Service is excellent and I particularly appreciate online and text messages changes, holiday service schedules, and other important information. They do a good job of keeping the customer informed. They only get 4 stars because I wish they offered recycling options.

name: T Monique (TeeTee)
text: I've had this service for about a month my garbage has only been picked up once. I was told Thursday then Wednesday the following week. Been on the list for pick up, garbage is still sitting on the road waiting for pick up. No explanation. Call again no supervisor available to speak with me so I'm officially paying for a service I don't receive. Go figure....If this is a example of quality service you can keep it.

name: Robin Watson
text: I never have to worry if my trash is going to be picked up. If the driver does for some reason miss my can all I have to do is call the Lincoln office and the people there are always so nice and kind, and they report my missed pick up. Usually by the next day my trash is being picked up. The people at the Lincoln branch are the best. I'm very please with the service I get.

name: Jolie Black Bear
text: The garbage service is great. The drivers are timely and efficient. Customer service left something to be desired. I waited 8 weeks after paying for cans to be delivered and service to begin, then I was later billed for service I didn't receive while waiting. The resolution of both issues was not very satisfying. The business end of things has been frustrating, but the garbage service itself has always been easy and problem-free. My advice is to be sure they have cans to sell you before paying for service, and if not, ask to be contacted when they do. Otherwise you may wait months as I did. Expect a delay before service begins, and if you have any issues with your can. They have workers (contractors?) that do the delivery and swapping of cans, and their availability seems to vary.

name: Leah Harrison
text: If I had the opportunity to give it ZERO stars, I absolutely would. This is by far the worst company to deal with. We paid for service several weeks ago and have yet to receive our can and services but better believe we've already paid for it. Told us expect trash can to arrive no later than 5 business days and 12 BUSINESS days later and several phone calls we are hearing the exact same thing "trash can is scheduled for delivery today." the day passes and we never receive a can. Told us to just leave our trash out and they'll come pick it up and that doesn't happen either. Their customer service is comical. save yourself a major headache.

name: Natalie Strickland
text: Advanced Disposal is always on time. When they are closed for a holiday, l appreciate getting a notice through my email as a reminder that pickup will be a day later. Thanks for all you do!!

name: Kim Bryan
text: Advanced Disposal makes garbage disposal worry free.  We set up automatic payment, and we are notified when schedules are changed for holidays.  It's a no-brainier using Advanced Disposal.  The only thing we have to do is take our can to the road, and the rest is done for us!!!

name: Lee Beaver
text: Has trash service stopped no one picked up today

name: Jezzica Bella
text: I can tell already that i am going to have issues with this company they do not do bulk pick up so if you are moving and have some furninshing to throw away you are screwed. I cant get my trash pickup for tomorrow because its late i dont care what time it is they are a business and need to conduct their business a whole lot better than im sorry I cant pick up your trash if a customer is paying and you are open for business then make business not excuses...

name: Eduardo A Salgado
text: Live in a relatively new (2 years old) development in Sylacauga, around Lay Lake. Perhaps because of that my experience has not been as expected. Went through a period where the only way to get the garbage picked up was to call the office and insist. The people answering the phone are always nice to deal with but they do not seem to have the power to get the service done when the drivers fail to pick up. As an example, last week, they missed the Wednesday pick up. I figured it was because of the Veteran's Day so did not call until they failed to pick up again on Thursday. Called again on Friday. They promised a "work order" for Monday. Well, today is Tuesday and no pick up yet. Since tomorrow is the regular pick up, I'll again get the bin to the curb before sundown tonight. That is to be ready in case the pick up is before the normal 11AM or so. Have been reimbursed for no pickups and that is OK. But we need to have more dependable service. The normal reason for skipped pickups is that a "new driver  missed us". So maybe is bad training and not bad service. Works out the same from our point of view. Once the service gets OK, it stays OK for a while, maybe months. Sorry about the review but you asked during a time when my garbage has not been picked up for a week. Last period of time when this happened, had to call Better Business bureau to get it to resume. There, I've vented. Get back on reliable weekly pick up and I'll come back and give you a better review. No need to lose your contract. I am sure many people depend on you for their jobs and for disposal services. Best of luck!

name: Selena Coffey
text: They suck. You pay for weekly service and you still have to call and remind them to pick up trash. They tell you they pit in a work order and they still don't pick it up. They contact the driver and the driver tells them they did service you. Which is a lie. You would come out better to just haul it off yourself! !!!!!

name: Buck Runyan
text: pit-a-ful!  Just the day week they sent out an email wanting you to say how good they were, for the tenth time this year, outside of holidays, they failed to pick up on the trash day.  I knew something was up when they said they would give away money for good reviews.  Sad thing they have a monopoly and nothing can be done.  They are the worse.

name: Amy Miller
text: Office staff is always quick and helpful. Trash is always picked up on time. Even holiday schedules are picked up quickly.

name: Julie Gray
text: We’ve had service with them for 10 years and the past 5 have been a nightmare. If we had another company to provide service in our area I would rally my whole neighborhood to change. My can has to put out on the side of a hill and the can gets hit once a month. This leaves me picking up trash on the side of the road and without a pickup for 2 weeks. Call in and request for a route supervisor to call you and never heard from them. Request a credit on my bill sure I get the bill and it’s not on the bill. I have never dealt with a company that provides a service and expects you to pay in advance for a service and then not deliver. Customer care is always nice but nothing ever changes but the local branch is terrible.

name: Tracy P
text: Eh.  Almost without fail they forget to pick up our garbage on Saturday after a holiday (I guess our regular Friday guy is off) which isn't so bad, but then they want to bring out a different (old, beat-up or shorter) can to replace my relatively new can.  Once, when they forgot to pick up my garbage I tried chasing down a truck that was traveling on a road that connects to mine, thinking he was our garbage guy.  Anyhoo, he wasn't, and for a couple seconds I thought I might be a victim of road rage.  We used to leave Christmas presents for our old guys and if I knew where to find coal these days I'd leave something for these guys too.

name: Cindy Davidovich
text: Always on time !! Always keep you informed by text or email if the date changes for pick up. Would definitely recommend Advanced Disposal

name: Carmen McKiven
text: Efficient after you get your account established.  I had a rough go waiting to get our trash can.  But, after we finally received our trash can, we have no complaints.  Trash is picked up on time every single week.  No skipping!

name: Stephen McGatha
text: I don't use them but they should be charged for littering all down the road!!!!

name: Ernest Thurston
text: I'm no longer a customer. I don't produce enough trash to warrant a large container every week. My weekly trash fits in a small plastic grocery bag. Also I recycle. AD doesn't offer recycle pick up in my area. They also don't accept yard waste. So my only option is to take my recyclables to a facility in Anniston or one of the recycle trailers in McClellan. I have to take my yard waste in my P/U to the land fill and pay eight dollars to dump it. Using Advanced Disposal  is a WASTE of my money and time. So I cancelled my service.

name: Kris Hines
text: Usually good to keep on schedule but if something happens and they miss us, they get here soon as they can.  Quick to replace damaged cans.

name: Aundrea Pate
text: They have lost my payments twice now. Then want to charge a late fee. If I had another trash conpany for my area I would kick this company to the curve. They also leave cans in THE MIDDLE OF THE ROAD after pickup for ppl to hit and damage their car.

name: Casi Brown
text: Our bill is constantly changing. We were told a set low amount every three months but we are getting billed higher, various different amounts every billing period. Also we are getting billed after two months, not three. After speaking to others that have this service, they've said their's is much cheaper! What's up with that? Shouldn't everyone be treated equally?  Got to have a trash service though and it's the only one available in our area. What do you do?!

name: Chenoa
text: This is the worst company ever! I wish they'd lose the contact! The drivers pick up people's trash who NEVER pay, yet if I am late paying my trash it doesn't get picked up! Anytime I have called them I stay on hold no less than 20 minutes and IF anyone does answer they are rude and hateful! They are unorganized and the drivers leave a lot to be desired! I've been billed for dates I had already paid for and they refused to fix the problem. This company is nothing but a bunch of drug addicts, the Lincoln branch anyway!

name: Janet the HipGyp
text: This about the 5th time I've had pickup issues...usually it's just not picked up and I have to call the office. Twice they have taken my can by mistake because my neighbor didn't pay their bill. It took 6 WEEKS before they brought me a can and when they did it was about half the size of what other can held. I called but they never brought my normal sized can. The prices have gone up so I'm paying more for them to pick up less trash. Now to my current problem.  My trash was supposed to be picked up last Thursday...I called Friday and was assured it would be picked up by 4 p.m. that day. Here it is Monday and I just called again...same old story that they will put in a work order...just like I was told Friday. I asked for a credit to my account but was told they couldn't do that unless it wasn't picked up by Thursday....my contract is for once a week not once every two weeks so next stop I guess is the BBB.

name: Joshua Vincent
text: Service sucks, never receive a bill then they show up to pick up your can. I pay my bills if I receive a bill. City may need to look at re bidding waste services

name: George Sporl
text:
AD delivers and removes.
A great combination.

name: Diana Long
text: THERE GREAT SERVICE THEY PROVIDE, AND COURTEOUS CUSTOMER SERVICE, AND IF ONLY THE BRING THE GARBAGE CAN BACK, !!!!!!!

name: Neeli Faulkner
text: A few months ago the truck picked up my bin and accidentally drove off with it. I tried to contact customer service via email (twice) and did not receive a response. I called the Lincoln office after I did not receive an email response within 48 hours and was told it would take 10-14 business days to receive a new bin. At this point, I had already been without a bin for 2 days and was very unhappy to hear I would have to wait almost 2 weeks to receive another one, especially when I was paid up on my bill. I took to Facebook to make a complaint on the AD page that night, and by mid morning the local manager contacted me. He was very friendly and apologized for the mistake, and a bin was delivered to me the next day. Had I not gotten in contact with a manager, I would have given a 1 star review, but because of the friendliness of the manager and the fact my bin was replaced quickly, I bumped it up to 3. On a side note: My neighbor's mailbox has recently been destroyed by the AD truck (I know this because my security cameras caught it on video), and when she contacted customer service she had the same luck as I did. I advised her to go through FB to remedy the issue, and when she did, her mailbox was promptly replaced. AD's customers should not be forced to go through FB to have an issue fixed.

name: Michele W
text: Timely pickup.  Customer service works to correct errors quickly.

name: Sparkles The Cat

name: Ang Ash
text: Very punctual. Would highly recommend them.

name: Hollie Payne

text: Best service and prices around

name: Jamie Goodwin
text: I paid for a dumpster to be delivered and was told it would be delivered the next day and it wasn’t. I had to call them to see why it wasn’t delivered and was told it would be deliver by 6:30am today and it’s 8:53 am and I still haven’t gotten what I’ve paid for. The dispatch lady was very rude. Poor service all together!!

name: PATTY BANKS
text: I'm with the Glass Doctor of Tuscaloosa and use Rumsey for our dumpster service. It is so nice to call and actually speak to someone whom by the way is always so friendly and helpful. If they say they are going to do something... they do! We have had to ask for extra pick-ups on occasion and they have always sent a truck promptly. Great service

name: Harley Ryland
text: Good place. Nice guys.

name: Jen Miles
text:
This company violates all city ordinances and are the most unprofessional people, company and services I have ever experienced. I am not a person that posts on reviews at all, this however, is warranted.

This company is supposed to pick up our complex’s garbage after 6 am in the morning. To not ramble, the management team has called and emailed this company over the past year about correcting this. My husband and I work and their trucks continuously come between 2:15 - 4:15 am. They are in violating many ordinances and their contract is going to keep going for a bit more. Nothing more to do but post this in essence to warn people of their continuing incompetence and no regard for residents, bylaws and contractual agreements.

name: Eve Engle
text: I have rented from Rumsey twice. The first time they did not give me a specific day/time of when they would retrieve my rental. They did show up, but several days later. I finally called because I was worried they would charge me extra. This time they came before 8am and I had not been notified to be there to unlock my gates. I live an hour away. I was told they would have to charge me $125 extra to come back. I waited around all day, finally to be told I would have to return the next day to let them in. I am disgusted. I do not recommend this company.

name: Samantha Dorough
text: Been working together with their staff for over a decade. The staff is always professional and helpful in any way.

name: Lela Collum
text: Followed one of their trucks down highway 72 west for over 15 miles to Barton Al where they went towards the tissue plant. This truck had a large dumpster on the back and paper flew out  the entire time down the road. Some “environmental service “

name: Chintan Patel
text:
Bad customer service. Dumpster was not delivered even after 3 days of told delivery date. Then they don't update you the status and then if you call them and tell them about it, they start crying and they are asking their customers to apologise for it.

It was your fault , you don't deliver the dumpster and you don't even call the customer and give update about the delivery date. And then you ask the customer for apologizing if they get angry

My friend I think customer service is an important word you are missing out .

name: Debbie Long
text: Very rude employees, very overpriced.  Quoted 700.00 charged almost 1000.00. Delivered with a male private part on the side and did not even care to clean it off. When we complained about the problems was told to shut up and was hang up on.  This is after we paid of course.

name: Tamer Eltibi
text:
3 weeks no show up to empty the garage
Every time i call they are rude and they will say we will send someone and again no one show up !!!!!

name: Trena Wise
text:
Just a warning to anyone needing a residential dumpster. Rumsey will deliver the dumpster to your house. You pay for 10 days and they will mention that you can keep it longer if needed but they will fail to tell you that they may pick up at 7 am on the 10th day regardless of the time it was dropped off. You MUST call them in advance if you want to keep it longer. They will not call you or tell you the time frame that they pickup so if your pickup date is a Monday,  better call them the prior week to schedule a longer drop off time if you need more time.

I received zero use out of my dumpster and thought I could call first thing Monday morning to have it scheduled longer but was told that it had been picked up at 7 am, didn't even get a full 10 day use out of it and spent almost $400.00. I would have been better off burning my $400.00. If you want to use their service, better make sure you ask the date of pickup and the time frame so you can make a decision if you want to keep it longer as they have very poor communication.

name: El Chechito
text: Late pulls , bad service.

name: Shawn Williams
text: Terrible place to work!

name: Regional Homes of Northport
text: Fast service on dumping containers!

name: Auron181
text: Charged us 127.45$ to simply change the name on the utilities bill. They stated its due to opening it as a new account under a different name. Also incredibly unprofessional when it comes to actually getting trash. Stating when the trash can is on the sidewalk it is 15ft from the road. That is a bold faced lie. Im taking time stamped pictures. Seriously this service is beginning to eat at my patience. Hope you see this when considering their services.

name: Michael Pitts
text: They returned my deposit by crediting it to my current bills. July was the first month this year I had to pay due to that. Just nice to have my money returned.

name: Al Gossan
text:
We have waited around 4 months to get our cable buried after installation and it is STILL not done. This is after calling repeatedly and getting promises it would be done by secretary, managers, etc.

They also buried our neighbors (who moved in several months after we did and STILL didn’t do ours...even though the technician mentioned to our neighbor he saw the “mess” of our cable laying there!!

They OBVIOUSLY need to hire more people to keep up with their booming business OR they will experience a mass exodus as soon as another cable company comes to compete. Shortsighted business practices that will backfire in a big way! WAKE up company leaders before it is too late.

name: John Smith Sr
text: Quick to response and bring the darkness into the light.

name: Rachel Engle
text: They have always been so understanding and I am impressed at how willing they were to help and how understanding they were when things got tough with this covid19 stuff. I'm so appreciative and so glad we chose them.

name: Bernard Cook
text: Very easy to find, fast efficient & very cordial service, quite impressed!

name: Susan Wangner
text:
Hubby and I are so happy that Riviera can repair appliances. We only have our water with them, no other utilities. A friend suggested we call Riviera to repair the clothes dryer several years ago so they came and fixed the problem right away. The dishwasher had an issue later so once again, we called Riviera to get ‘er done. Yesss!

Now more recently, we decided to FINALLY  get our ice maker repaired. It had been on the blink for several years and we were tired of messing with it, so we got the repair guys out. We knew it would be costly since the ice maker needed replacing (we figured that) but the estimate they gave us and the estimate we had guessed was the same! No worries about being overcharged, ever. These guys are prompt and so courteous.

We will always call Riviera for our appliance repair needs. Thanks guys!

name: Nikia Robinson
text: Very unprofessional,  we asked to get cable installed and had to wait a whole week , also the cable guy FINALLY came and he acted like he didn't have a clue what he was doing . he told me the maintenance people had to do something in order to get the cable,  ok . I got maintenance here they said he was suppose to do everything because they have cable n internet with rivera . Called them to tell them about the issue . They called back saying that the cable guy told them I said I didn't want the cable anymore. Which was a complete LIE because if I didn't want it I wouldn't have paid .. We asked for a refund n we couldn't get it . And they never told us no refunds ..

name: James Childers
text: Internet service is terrible. I'm only getting about 20% of the speed I'm paying for. Have called several times but nothing has gotten better.

name: Richard Haygood
text: Only owed a small amount and they were ready to take our meter. Always paid our bill every month. Tried to get a one week extension, not a chance. Why are there other customers with $500+ bills still with their meters? Disgusted by this company.

name: Juli “Crappie Queen” Chandler
text:
Decent service
Expensive start Up fee

name: Colton Stevens
text: You'll get the other 3 back when we get internet back.....

name: Beach Rat
text:
WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!  Been paying for their premium internet service which  is supposed to be 40.  Since the date it was connected, November 14th,  I have been lucky to get around 14-20 mbs and not the 40 I'm paying for.  I have tried numerous times to get this problem corrected.  Technical support advised me that there were "upgrades being made" which I was later informed that was a lie and evidently used just to appease me.  I've since called back numerous times and left messages which are rarely returned.
I actually had one lady transfer me around and when I kept getting transferred back to her she sent me right back to their internet help department which I had already spoken to thanks to numerous times for several hours total.  Their internet help department apologized and transferred me back to her and the phones had been switched off saying that they were closed.  After successfully giving me the runaround for nearly 30 minutes she was able to just switch the phone off and be on her merry way.   I left Century Link due to poor internet speed and piss poor customer service.  It appears Riviera isn't much better.  I understand things happen with technological items and speeds vary.  But to never get the speed I'm paying for and to constantly get the run around when trying to get the problem fixed is unacceptable.  If only Mediacom serviced my area.  I've been with Riviera for years and this is by FAR the worst experience I've ever had with them.

name: elayna vail
text: They responded immediately and Nick and Russell, the 2 fellows that came out ,, were very courteous and kind and polite and fixed my meter right away and answered all my questions and never complained even though it was a very cold day. It’s hard to meet people with good attitudes in any service nowadays but these men had good friendly attitudes.  Thank you guys.

name: Matt White
text: Ask for Anthony for your appliance repair needs. He was by far the best and most helpful person in repairing my hot water heater after lightning strike! I called a lot of places before Riviera Utilities and they were the only ones that were helpful in my case! Thanks!

name: Walter Rosene
text: First technician could not help us, when we talked to more Senior personnel they were able to quickly come out and do our installation.  Very nice people to work with.

name: Howard L.
text: Great facilities.

name: Inc 0000
text: ITs bad when u have to go beyond a Supervisior!!! will update very soon!!

name: Candice Perry
text: Horrible prices. A 1000 square foot apartment costs over $275 a month for water and electric ONLY. When I was on Baldwin EMC I had a 1200 Sq ft condo and it was never over $150. Extremely rude customer service and they are never on time when they need to come by. HORRIBLE

name: Liz Pierce

name: Anthony Chaney
text: If they don't have the part in stock they can get it in the next day or two. Always willing to help diagnose the problem. And they also Repair Appliances & Air Conditioners.

name: Pat Clay
text: Not much to review as far as cable internet.  They just don't offer it and it's 2016.  This leaves the only internet service provider in much of the service area as CenturyLink.  CenturyLink offers substandard internet service at substandard speeds at an inflated price because they can;  they're the only game in town.   I spoke with a Riviera Utilities rep about why they don't offer cable internet and she said that they did not want to compete with private business.  I don't really understand this response as subscription television is offered by Dish and DirecTV and if I'm not mistaken, they compete against cable television services.   So, with the help of Riviera choosing to not have cable internet and competing with CenturyLink, if you're in Foley Alabama, welcome to 1995.

text: I can’t praise these guys enough. They cleaned out a three bay + work room garage that was loaded to the brim with stuff. Andrew came out and gave me an estimate and before I knew it people were removing and loading things into their trucks and creating a brand new cleaned out work areas and a storage area for me. The guys went above and beyond. It looks absolutely beautiful. they even moved some shelving into the garage for me that I had assembled without me even asking them to. Just beyond kind and professional and efficient. Wonderful. As I continue with other projects around this house/property I’m sure I will give them a call to help! The best!

name: Wesley Grogan
text:
It is impossible to recommend Trey Bennett and 1-800-Got-Junk in Mobile enough. I have had to close down a large facility with only a few months notice and generated a massive amount of junk that needed to be discarded. Trey met with me, helped generate a game plan, and has stood behind his word at every moment.

His team is top-notch, works extremely hard, and is always courteous to me and the other employees. They are considerate of the facility and the other equipment, show up on time as scheduled, and always perform at the best of their ability. If you have junk that needs to be removed, Trey provides a service that takes care of all of your needs at a price that is highly competitive. Just a fantastic company all the way around.

text:
Excellent ,Quick Service! I was moving from out of town and the Homeowner I bought the new house from left a lot of junk in the garage and in the house! Plus a mattress/boxspring and old TV at the curb. I called 1-800 Got Junk and made an appointment the following morning. With in an hour the next day they  had everything cleaned up and on their truck. Everything was cleaned up and gone before my movers arrived!
The guys were so professional!
This service is worth its weight in Gold.
I will use them again .
Thanks for giving me back my piece of mind!
Michael Horton
Mobile Al.36607
